target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003760_EAA<tab>ここにある碑は、そうした者たちの辞世の言葉を刻んだものだ。
……それすらも虚しいと、遺さなかった者は多いがね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003770_EAB<tab>Once we have obtained vessels of flesh, we likewise intend to vanish.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003770_EAB<tab>私とて、消え去りたいのは同じだよ。
それを、肉体を得て死ぬという手段で実現しようというだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003780_EAA<tab>If you understand this─understand aught of our tale─you will abandon your quest for knowledge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003780_EAA<tab>だから……悪いことは言わない。
君たちは今すぐ、知的探求の一切を放棄すべきだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003790_EAA<tab>Ignorance truly is bliss. If you would cling to your illusory happiness, remain primitive and pure. It is the only way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003790_EAA<tab>何も知らないのが、いちばん幸福だよ。
原始的なままでいること、
それが生命の、たったひとつの冴えた在り方だったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003800_YSHTOLA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003800_YSHTOLA<tab>はぁ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003810_YSHTOLA<tab>So that's your story.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003810_YSHTOLA<tab>……まさか、その程度の話だったなんてね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003820_YSHTOLA<tab>While I appreciate your advice, I will not heed it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003820_YSHTOLA<tab>悪いけれど、忠告は聞き入れられないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003830_YSHTOLA<tab>Convinced though you may be of this truth, it is yours and not mine. Indeed truth, I have ever believed, is in the eye of the beholder.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003830_YSHTOLA<tab>他人の出した「唯一無二の答え」は、
私にとっての絶対じゃない……
いつだって、真実は見る者次第だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003840_EAA<tab>Are you suggesting that we have reached a faulty conclusion? That our science failed us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003840_EAA<tab>……私たちの導き出した終わりが、誤っていると？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003850_YSHTOLA<tab>Hardly. As you yourself said, the subject matter is beyond my comprehension.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003850_YSHTOLA<tab>あら、あなた、最初に自分で言ったでしょう？
イーア族の学術的知識は理解できないだろう、とね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>And that, I accept, is true. I do not possess the knowledge to prove or disprove your conclusion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003860_YSHTOLA<tab>事実、今の私には、
あなたたちの導き出した結末を証明することも、
否定することもできはしないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003870_YSHTOLA<tab>In my mortal years, I doubt I could even approach the wisdom of the Ea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003870_YSHTOLA<tab>それどころか、短い一生を費やしたところで、
イーア族の知見には遠く及ばないかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003880_YSHTOLA<tab>But of one thing am I absolutely certain: I would <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be happier in ignorance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003880_YSHTOLA<tab>……けれどね。
知ることをやめる方が幸せだなんて、私は思わない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003890_ALISAIE<tab>Y'shtola, no! You mustn't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003890_ALISAIE<tab>ヤ・シュトラ、だめ、待って……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>The most important lesson I've learned...is that learning isn't simply passing one's eyes over words.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>私が得てきた答え……知ることの本質……
それは、羅列された情報を目に映すことではないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>Nay... 'Tis when understood for oneself that knowledge attains its true value.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>自分で、納得すること。
それができたとき、知識は本当の意味で糧になった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>This is what has sustained me. Driven me onward in joy and wonder. In anger and sorrow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>感動や歓び、ときには悲しみや怒りをともなって、
私を突き動かしてきたのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003930_YSHTOLA<tab>The universe may end, and all may be for naught. But I will live as I always have.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003930_YSHTOLA<tab>宇宙が終わる？　すべてが無駄？
……だとしても、こんな面白いこと手放せない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003940_YSHTOLA<tab>I will always seek out new knowledge. And no conclusion of yours, no matter how grim, can dampen my desire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003940_YSHTOLA<tab>私は、私の世界を見通し続ける。
あなたたちの結論は……好奇心のひとつも、殺せなくてよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003950_EAA<tab>I suppose it is only to be expected. Their feeble minds cannot fathom the terrifying gravity of it all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003950_EAA<tab>……やはり、後進星の生命体か。
私たちの忠告を、正しく理解できていないようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003960_EAB<tab>But worry not. We consider it our duty to enlighten you, and we will not stop until you grasp the full extent of our despair!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003960_EAB<tab>ならば、先ゆく者として、君が理解するまで教え込もう。
宇宙の真理が、どれほどの絶望であるのかを……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003970_YSHTOLA<tab>Keep calm, and listen well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003970_YSHTOLA<tab>……あなたたち、落ち着いて聞いて頂戴。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>Though my body will soon dissipate, there may be a way to restore it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003980_YSHTOLA<tab>じき私の身体も消える……
それをもとに戻す方法について、心当たりがあるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003990_YSHTOLA<tab>Azem's magick. So long as our souls remain, you can use it to summon us back.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_003990_YSHTOLA<tab>ハイデリンの力を受けた、アゼムの召喚術。
魂さえ残っていれば、それで私たちを喚び戻せるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004000_YSHTOLA<tab>But you mustn't, for it would mean losing our way forward. This, I only reveal so that you can promise not to invoke the magick.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004000_YSHTOLA<tab>でも駄目、それでは道がまた途絶えてしまう。
あえてこの話をしているのは、可能性に気づいても、
使わないと約束してほしかったからよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004010_YSHTOLA<tab>We came here knowing what victory may cost, so press on. Press on, and do not look back.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004010_YSHTOLA<tab>私たちは、全員の力で勝ちにきた。
だからこそ、託されたときは進みなさい……ただ前へ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004020_URIANGER<tab>I shall join thee. As subterfuge is not required, thou shalt not suffer for mine absence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004020_URIANGER<tab>ご一緒させてください。
諜報活動でもなし、人が多くて困ることはないでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004030_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004030_YSHTOLA<tab>ウリエンジェ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004040_URIANGER<tab>My resolve hath never been as strong as thine. Full oft have I wavered in my decisions, and afterwards been stricken with regret.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004040_URIANGER<tab>……私は、あなたほど堅固な意志を持ちません。
迷い、後悔することも少なくない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004050_URIANGER<tab>In spite of this, I may still stand with my comrades, supporting them as they attempt the greatest of feats.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004050_URIANGER<tab>されど、こんな私でも誰かとともに在り、
背中を押すことができる……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004060_URIANGER<tab>This truth, I have learned in the course of our journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004060_URIANGER<tab>それを……この旅で学んだことを、信じたいのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004065_URIANGER<tab>And many though my shortcomings may be, I may also claim to excel in prophecies. My studies into which have granted me the flexibility of mind needed to bend this malleable reality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004065_URIANGER<tab>幸いにして、数多の預言詩を学んだ身……
事実を婉曲にし、解釈の幅を持たせることにかけても、
少々自信がございます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004070_URIANGER<tab>Thus shall I hope... That thou mayest have the strength to resist, and our comrades the strength to continue.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004070_URIANGER<tab>私は願う……
あなたやサンクレッド、エスティニアンに抗う力を。
そして残る者たちに、進む力を与えんと！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>With you to urge us on, how could we possibly fail?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>……確かに、悪くないわ。
ちっとも負ける気がしないもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004090_METEION<tab>What's this? An extinguished civilization...rekindled?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004090_METEION<tab>(-？？？？-)あら……？
閉じたはずの文明に、明かりが灯ってしまったのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004100_ALISAIE<tab>That's right! Our quest doesn't end here. We'll press on...and we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004100_ALISAIE<tab>ええそうよ……！
ここはまだ、私たちの行き止まりじゃない。
今にあなたにも、届いてみせるんだから！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004110_METEION<tab>There. That's where you'll find me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004110_METEION<tab>私たちは、あそこにいるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004120_GRAHATIA<tab>Is that...another star?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004120_GRAHATIA<tab>あれも星、なのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004130_METEION<tab>Of the stars we visited, most were already devoid of life. And where there was life still, the inhabitants wished for death.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004130_METEION<tab>私たちは、いくつもの星を渡ってきた。
多くはすでに滅んでいたし、かろうじて見つけられた生命も、
何かしらの理由で生きることを呪っていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004140_METEION<tab>But even death, we learned, isn't truly the end. It is but a part of the cycle of rebirth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004140_METEION<tab>でもね、たくさん翔んでみてわかったの。
死ですら完璧な終わりではないんだって。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004150_METEION<tab>Souls return to the star─or in its absence, a larger flow. And eventually they are reborn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004150_METEION<tab>だって、命は巡るんだもの。
星の内で……それが壊れれば、もっと大きな輪の中で……
ずっとずっと流転する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004160_METEION<tab>Alive again, to know suffering anew...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004160_METEION<tab>それじゃあ、苦しい生が、また始まってしまうわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004170_METEION<tab>True salvation lies not in dying. It lies in not being born.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004170_METEION<tab>本当の終わり……本当の救いはね……
死ぬだけじゃなくて「もう生まれてこないこと」よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004180_METEION<tab>This is the gift I would give to you. To all life on beautiful Etheirys.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004180_METEION<tab>私たち、どうにかそれを届けたかったの。
すべての命に……恋しいアーテリスに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004190_METEION<tab>To that end, we created an egg wherein life cannot quicken─that dead sun.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004190_METEION<tab>だから、巣の核としてあれを造ったのよ。
死した太陽、孵らない卵！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004200_METEION<tab>Attain it if you can. Before your friends' emotions fade away─along with their protection.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004200_METEION<tab>あなたたちを護る想いが消えるのと、
私のところへ辿り着くの、どちらが早いかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004210_ALISAIE<tab>Well, I'm out of ideas...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004210_ALISAIE<tab>ダメね……正直さっぱりだわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004220_ALPHINAUD<tab>As am I. Operating such consoles is trying enough, but if we can't even activate it...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004220_ALPHINAUD<tab>私もだよ。
操作方法以前に、そもそも起動しないとなると、
どこをどうしていいやらだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004230_GRAHATIA<tab>Perhaps there is a way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004230_GRAHATIA<tab>……ひとつ、試せることがあるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004240_GRAHATIA<tab>First, consider the world that has been recreated here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004240_GRAHATIA<tab>まず考えるべきは、ここがどんな星の再現なのかってことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004250_GRAHATIA<tab>Its inhabitants were machines who gathered combat data to enhance themselves. And among the many wars they waged, the most notable was that against the dragons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004250_GRAHATIA<tab>住民たちの、機械のような体……
戦闘の記録を集めて自分を強化してるって話や、
竜の星と戦っていたこと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004260_GRAHATIA<tab>As you've doubtless surmised, I believe this was the home world of Omega.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004260_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたも予想がついてるんじゃないか？
……そう、ここはあのオメガの母星だと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004270_GRAHATIA<tab>Cid built a jamming device to defeat it. A device which generated massive bursts of lightning, its sole weakness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004270_GRAHATIA<tab>で、オメガ本体と戦ったときのことを思い出してくれ。
シドがオメガの弱点は雷だって見抜いて、
強力な雷発生装置を作ってくれたんだよな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004280_GRAHATIA<tab>As you've doubtless surmised, I believe this was the home world of Omega.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004280_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたも予想がついてるんじゃないか？
……そう、ここはあのオメガの母星だと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004290_GRAHATIA<tab>According to the records I read in the future, it possessed a single weakness: lightning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004290_GRAHATIA<tab>そして、オレがいた「未来」に残ってた調査記録によると、
オメガはどうやら、雷を苦手としてたらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004300_GRAHATIA<tab>The significance of these details may be lost on you now, but they lead me to believe this was the home world of Omega.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004300_GRAHATIA<tab>今のあんたじゃ、知らない情報もあるかもしれないが……
ここはあのオメガの母星だと思うんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004310_GRAHATIA<tab>According to the records I read in the future, it possessed a single weakness: lightning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004310_GRAHATIA<tab>そして、オレがいた「未来」に残ってた調査記録によると、
オメガはどうやら、雷を苦手としてたらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004320_GRAHATIA<tab>The significance of these details may be lost on you now, but they lead me to believe this was the home world of Omega.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004320_GRAHATIA<tab>どうしてそれが判断材料になるのかって聞かれたら、
「あったかもしれない未来で知った」としか、
答えられないんだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004330_GRAHATIA<tab>Aye, I speak of the ancient weapon. The one which the Alliance unleashed upon Shinryu.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004330_GRAHATIA<tab>ともかく、ここはオメガって兵器の、本当の故郷だと思う。
あんたたちも神龍と戦ってるところは見ただろうが、
あいつにはまだまだ秘密があったのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004340_GRAHATIA<tab>I will spare you the long story, but according to the records I read in the future, it possessed a single weakness: lightning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004340_GRAHATIA<tab>そして、オレが見た調査記録によると、
オメガはどうやら、雷を苦手としてたらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004350_ALISAIE<tab>That's all well and good, but what does that─ ...Wait, you're not thinking to strike the console with lightning, are you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004350_ALISAIE<tab>それがこの端末とどう関係してくるわけ？
まさか、雷を落とそうっていうんじゃないでしょうね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004360_GRAHATIA<tab>As a matter of fact, I am. Ask yourselves this: why would an entity as puissant as Omega not be designed to suppress the effects of lightning?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004360_GRAHATIA<tab>そのまさかさ。
オメガほど強力な兵器が雷に弱かったのは、
遮断するわけにはいかなかったから……とは考えられないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Because it relies upon it─or something akin to it─as a source of energy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004370_ALPHINAUD<tab>ふむ……。
自身を動かしたり、何らかの機能を行使する際に、
雷に近いものを用いていたということだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004380_GRAHATIA<tab>My thoughts exactly. And there is a good chance the same is true of the Omicrons and their devices.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004380_GRAHATIA<tab>とすれば、ほかのオミクロンや、彼らの扱う装置も、
同じ造りになってる可能性があるんじゃないかと思ってさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004390_GRAHATIA<tab>So, shall I cast caution to the wind and try something reckless and dramatic?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004390_GRAHATIA<tab>ひとまず軽い雷撃を落としてみようと思うんだが……いいか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Have at it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>任せた！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm not sure this is a good idea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>心配だ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Or I could use my custom-made Omega Jammer!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>オメガジャマー発動！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004400_GRAHATIA<tab>Very well, here I go!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004400_GRAHATIA<tab>了解っ、それじゃあいくぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004410_GRAHATIA<tab>Worry not, I will be careful. And if it fails, we can think of something else.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004410_GRAHATIA<tab>ちゃんと加減はするさ。
ダメだったら次の手を考えるから、一度だけ試させてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004420_GRAHATIA<tab>You still have it!? Cid and Nero's legendary device, which brought low the superweapon Omega!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004420_GRAHATIA<tab>えっ、あんたまだあれを持ってるのか！？
シドの決断とガーロンド社の技術、そしてネロの激励が生んだ、
あの伝説の対オメガ用装置を……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004430_GRAHATIA<tab>Wait... The actual device was much too big to lug around, so you must have only the control module. And there I was getting all excited...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004430_GRAHATIA<tab>って、あれはシドが本体を制御してないと使えないだろ！
からかうなよな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004440_GRAHATIA<tab>Never mind. An old-fashioned spell will suffice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004440_GRAHATIA<tab>今回はオレの魔法でやるから、見ててくれ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004450_ALISAIE<tab>It...it worked!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004450_ALISAIE<tab>う、動いた……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004460_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-???-)Opening connection to Communications Module I... Connection established.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004460_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-？？？？-)交信端末I号からの接続要求を確認……承認……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004470_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)Transmission: strategic Matrix Stigma-1 now online. As the primary strategic matrix, you may address me as “Sir.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004470_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)こちら、戦争戦略マトリクス「スティグマ・ワン」。
簡易的に、マスターと呼んでいただいても構いません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004480_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)Checking for new communications... None found. All units, please maintain current state.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004480_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)新着の伝達事項は、0件です。
各部門、引き続き現状を維持してください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004490_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)End transmission. Closing connection...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004490_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)交信終了……接続を切断します……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004500_GRAHATIA<tab>Wait! We have questions for you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004500_GRAHATIA<tab>待ってくれ！
マスター、あんたに質問があるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004510_GRAHATIA<tab>Of late, no mission orders have been issued. Why not? Has there been some manner of trouble?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004510_GRAHATIA<tab>……ここ最近、出撃命令が下りないのはどうしてだ？
何か問題でもあったのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004520_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)Reply: the extended operations unit has yet to determine guidelines for future assignments.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004520_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)ワタシの知能は、複数の独立したユニットが担っています。
そのうち「長期行動計画ユニット」が、
今後の指針を決定していません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004530_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)All strategies are calculated, devised, and actioned in accordance with said guidelines.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004530_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)すべての作戦行動は、
当該ユニットの出す指針に則り、計画、実行されます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004540_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)In the interim, all citizens are directed to maintain a state of combat readiness. End reply. Awaiting query.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004540_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)各員においては、戦闘準備を継続しつつ、
作戦決定まで待機してください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004550_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you tell us why the extended operations unit hasn't yet determined the guidelines?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004550_ALPHINAUD<tab>長期行動計画ユニットは、なぜ判断を遅らせているのだろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004560_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)Unable to comply. Information unavailable or access restricted.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004560_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)回答不能……
ワタシの情報か、アナタの権限、いずれかが不足しています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004570_ALPHINAUD<tab>In that case, is it possible for us to communicate directly with the unit?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004570_ALPHINAUD<tab>では、長期行動計画ユニットと、直接交信させてもらうことは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004580_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)...Access denied. Unable to establish connection.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004580_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)…………接続が拒否されました。
当該ユニットにアクセスできません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004590_ALISAIE<tab>Is there anything you can tell us? Have there been any abnormalities, like a threat to the star or widespread unrest?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004590_ALISAIE<tab>じゃあ、ほかに何か異常はない！？
この星に危機が迫っているとか、
住民たちの不満が高まってるとか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004600_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)Reply: negative. All citizens continue to operate at maximum efficiency.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004600_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)いずれの質問にも相当する事象はありません。
住民は皆、「健やかに生きて」います。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004610_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)If your operations are suboptimal, please proceed to a maintenance facility for evaluation. Otherwise, standby at your designated post. End reply.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004610_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)もしアナタが不調を感じているのならば<var 4A ((工場)) ((クリニック)) /var>へ……
そうでなければ、持ち場で待機をお願いします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004620_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-Sir-)End transmission. Closing connection...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004620_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>(-マスター-)以上で回答はすべてです。
交信終了……接続を切断します……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004630_GRAHATIA<tab>I could activate it again, but I doubt it would be productive. What do you think?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004630_GRAHATIA<tab>どうするかな……。
もう一度起動させたとしても、取りつく島はなさそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004640_ALISAIE<tab>If all the Omicrons really were running as efficiently as it claimed, then I doubt they were hoping for life here to end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004640_ALISAIE<tab>とりあえず、今の話の範囲だと、
やっぱり終わりを望んでるって感じじゃなかったわよね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004650_ALISAIE<tab>As this Sir told us, there just haven't been any new instructions, and everyone is standing by.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004650_ALISAIE<tab>マスター自身も、出撃命令こそ出してないだけで、
準備はしておけって言っていたし。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004660_ALPHINAUD<tab>Should be standing by, at any rate. If there are those that are neglecting their duties, perhaps we can glean a clue from them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004660_ALPHINAUD<tab>逆に言えば、マスターの姿勢がそうである以上、
準備を怠っていたり、役目に逆らっている者がいれば、
怪しいかもしれないね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004670_ALPHINAUD<tab>I propose we take another look around, and also try to find the operations unit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004670_ALPHINAUD<tab>そのあたりを念頭に置きながら、
もう少し住民たちの様子を見てみないかい？
長期行動計画ユニットについても聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004680_M017<tab>As you have surmised, I am part of the shared intelligence of Stigma-1.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004680_M017<tab>……改めて、自己紹介をしましょう。
アナタ方の指摘どおり、
ワタシは、マスターの知能の一端を担う存在です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004690_M017<tab>It is─was my charge to determine the optimal path to achieving our prime function.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004690_M017<tab>種族全体の未来を検討し、そこに至る道筋を示すもの……
長期行動計画ユニットと呼ばれています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004700_M017<tab>This body had been abandoned by its former owner, and lay unused.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004700_M017<tab>この身体は、持ち主が別の身体に乗り換えたことで、
使われなくなっていたもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004710_M017<tab>I took it and abandoned my own─and with it my duty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004710_M017<tab>そこに入り込み……職務を放棄していました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004720_GRAHATIA<tab>May we ask why you did this? From what we gather, it seems to be a personal matter.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004720_GRAHATIA<tab>理由を聞かせてもらえないか？
さっき木の前で聞いた話も、あんた自身の悩みだったんだろ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004730_M017<tab>Our kind did not always look as we do now. Long ago, we possessed frail and feeble bodies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004730_M017<tab>……ワタシたちは、遥か昔、
まったく別の形をした、非常に弱い生き物でした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004740_M017<tab>Beleaguered by stronger races, our ancestors took to augmenting their flesh in order to defend themselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004740_M017<tab>同じ星に住む別の種族に圧倒され、追いやられた始祖たちは、
強さを求めて身体の一部を作り変えた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004750_M017<tab>What began with limited parts eventually spread to the whole body. And at last, a means was discovered to convert the mind into data, rendering even the brain obsolete.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004750_M017<tab>それがやがて全身に及び、最後に残った脳さえも、
精神を信号化して体外に保存できるようになったことで、
ついに不要となったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004760_M017<tab>Such complete mechanical beings were called the Omicrons. And by their might, we came to reign supreme over the star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004760_M017<tab>こうして完成した完全なる「機体」をオミクロンと呼び、
その力で、ワタシたちは星全土を制圧しました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004770_M017<tab>But even then, we did not feel secure. For we knew that the universe was home to civilizations aside from our own─civilizations that may be stronger still than us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004770_M017<tab>……けれども、すべての不安が払拭できたわけではありません。
ワタシたちの星はかねてより異星との交流があった。
そこに別の文明があることを、知っていたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004780_M017<tab>Rather than risk becoming the subjugated, we chose to become the subjugator. We began our conquest of the stars, that we might acquire the resources and knowledge we needed to reign supreme.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004780_M017<tab>弱き存在は、強き存在に制圧されます。
暗黒の宇宙では、より強くあらねばならないのです。
それを実現する資源と学習を求め、異星侵攻が行われました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004790_M017<tab>We were successful in that endeavor. So powerful did we become, we could lay low even the mighty dragons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004790_M017<tab>成果は実にめざましいものでした。
今では、あの竜星すらも滅ぼせるほどになっています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004800_M017<tab>But then something unexpected happened. I began experiencing an error: I could no longer determine an optimal path.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004800_M017<tab>けれど……ワタシはエラーを起こすようになってしまった……
先の計画を立てることができなくなってしまったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004810_ALISAIE<tab>You were malfunctioning?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004810_ALISAIE<tab>故障しちゃった、ってこと……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004820_M017<tab>I performed numerous full system scans, each time finding no issues. Yet the error persisted...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004820_M017<tab>何度も検査をしましたが、異常はありませんでした。
それなのに、どうしても、わからない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004830_M017<tab>It was then that I speculated: what would happen if we grew so powerful as to have no equal?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004830_M017<tab>強さを得た先……
誰にも負けなくなったとして、どうするのでしょう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004840_M017<tab>To become stronger was essential to our existence. Our every action has been in service to this objective.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004840_M017<tab>ワタシたちには、強くなることが必要だった。
そのための行為は、疑う余地もなく肯定されてきました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004850_M017<tab>But if nothing lies beyond this, can it be truly said that it was essential?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004850_M017<tab>ですが、もし、強くなったあとの目的がないのだとしたら……
それは本当に必要なことだったと言えるのでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004860_M017<tab>Have we been engaging only in wanton destruction?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004860_M017<tab>ワタシたちはただ、星々を破壊してきただけなのでは……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004870_ALPHINAUD<tab>You could find no threat to justify your purpose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004870_ALPHINAUD<tab>……それで君は、指針を出せなくなってしまったのだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004880_M017<tab>The Omicrons will never leave this star.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004880_M017<tab>オミクロンは、もう、この星から出ることはありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004890_M017<tab>They will stand by until their reserves of energy are spent. For I have no path to offer them. None.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004890_M017<tab>永遠に下されることのない出撃命令を待ち、閉じて、終わる。
今のワタシにできる選択は「選ばない」ことだけです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004900_GRAHATIA<tab>It is not our place to pass judgment on the deeds of the Omicrons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004900_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたたちがやってきたことの善し悪しは、
オレが語っていいことじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004910_GRAHATIA<tab>But surely this does not have to spell the end of your people?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004910_GRAHATIA<tab>だが、どんな形であれ、
ここを行き止まりにしないことはできるんじゃないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004920_GRAHATIA<tab>With your power and knowledge, the possibilities are endless. Why not seek out a new purpose?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004920_GRAHATIA<tab>新しい目的を、何がしたいかを、あんた自身が決めるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004930_M017<tab>That is impossible.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004930_M017<tab>……それは、不可能です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004940_M017<tab>In the beginning, we had a higher purpose than our pursuit of power.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004940_M017<tab>ワタシたちも、当初は何か目的をもって、
強さを求めていたはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004950_M017<tab>But we lost sight of it when we so irrevocably altered our fundamental forms.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004950_M017<tab>それがわからなくなってしまった要因は、
存在がすり替わっていたことだと推測しています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004960_M017<tab>When we cast aside our flesh, so too did we cast aside all that defined us. Nothing remains of who we once were.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004960_M017<tab>自身を機体に置き換え、脳さえも残っていません。
すべてのパーツを入れ替えたのです、
どうして同じものと言えるでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004970_M017<tab>I have no aspirations. No longer can I dream. The vital spark is lost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004970_M017<tab>ワタシはもう、ワタシであったもののように、
欲求や願望を創出することができない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004980_M017<tab>Lost amidst circuitry and code and commands...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004980_M017<tab>引き継がれてきた命令をこなすだけの、
実行端末にすぎなかったのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004990_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_004990_GRAHATIA<tab>……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005000_GRAHATIA<tab>I believe I know how to overcome this despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005000_GRAHATIA<tab>……なあ、オレ、この絶望なら突破できると思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005010_GRAHATIA<tab>The words are ready in my mind, but ere I speak them...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005010_GRAHATIA<tab>もう、のどまで出かかってる言葉があるんだ。
けど……それをぶつけるには…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005020_GRAHATIA<tab>I want you to make me a promise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005020_GRAHATIA<tab>オレとさ……！
約束を、してくれないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005030_GRAHATIA<tab>Be it across time or space, our promises have always connected us. And so I ask that you indulge me once more, that this won't be the end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005030_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたとの約束は、いつもオレと未来を繋いでくれた。
だから今回も、これが最後にはならないって……
そういう願掛け。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You say it, I'll do it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>なんでも来い

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I can't. Not again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>……ダメだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005040_GRAHATIA<tab>Is that so? In that case, I won't hold back.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005040_GRAHATIA<tab>へへ、言ったな？
だったら、思い切り欲張るぞ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005050_GRAHATIA<tab>Forcing you through this again is the last thing I want, and I'm sorry...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005050_GRAHATIA<tab>……あんたは優しいな。
なのに、いつも見送らせて、ごめん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005060_GRAHATIA<tab>But we've never broken a promise to each other. So I ask that you have faith in us, and hear my request.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005060_GRAHATIA<tab>でもオレ、なんだかんだであんたとの約束は破ってないんだ。
今回もそうなるように……勝手だけど聞いてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005070_GRAHATIA<tab>First, I want to visit Ishgard with you. Properly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005070_GRAHATIA<tab>……まず、イシュガルドに行こう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005080_GRAHATIA<tab>We scarcely had time to look around last time. I should like it very much if you could show me the sights.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005080_GRAHATIA<tab>この前、エスティニアンを探しに行ったときは、
ゆっくり見て回れなかったからさ。
思い出の場所を、案内してくれよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005090_GRAHATIA<tab>Next, you must regale me with your greatest adventures. In the places where you lived them, if possible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005090_GRAHATIA<tab>それから……あんたはいろんな冒険をしてきただろ？
その中で、とっておきだったものを教えてほしい。
できれば現地でさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005100_GRAHATIA<tab>I may have read about all your deeds, but there is no substitute for a firsthand account.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005100_GRAHATIA<tab>せっかくまた同じ時代に生きてるんだ。
英雄譚を辿るんじゃなくて、直接話を聞けたら嬉しい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005110_GRAHATIA<tab>And last but not least, a new adventure together. Unlike any we've experienced before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005110_GRAHATIA<tab>最後に……
あんたも経験したことのない、新しい冒険に出よう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005120_GRAHATIA<tab>We'll travel the lands, cross the seas, and take to the skies upon the eternal wind─and it will be marvelous! It will...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005120_GRAHATIA<tab>大地を駆けて、海を渡り、ときには悠久の風に乗って空へ！
……絶対に、約束だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005130_GRAHATIA<tab>If you would humor me a moment─when we awaken each morning, how can we prove that we're the same individual who retired the night before?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005130_GRAHATIA<tab>なあ、マスター。
昨日おやすみって言った自分と、今日おはようを言った自分……
それが完全に同じものだって、どうやったら証明できる？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005140_GRAHATIA<tab>Through the remembrance of past events, we might say. We have our memories. Yet there are times when we forget, or recall incorrectly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005140_GRAHATIA<tab>記憶が繋がってることか？
……でもそれは、忘れてしまうこともあるし、
ねつ造する方法だってあるよな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005150_GRAHATIA<tab>What of our bodies, then? It is the same one, we might say. Yet technically speaking, as living beings, our bodies are constantly changing. It will never be as it was at an earlier point in time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005150_GRAHATIA<tab>なら、同じ身体を持つことか？
……厳密にいえば、生きているだけで身体は変わっていく。
完全に一致させることは不可能だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005160_GRAHATIA<tab>Our souls are no more immutable. On our star, people are known to inherit the souls of others, yet they are decidedly different beings.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005160_GRAHATIA<tab>魂にしたって……
オレたちの星には、ひとつの魂から分かたれた存在がいたが、
同じ人物ではなかったよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005170_GRAHATIA<tab>For my part, I've subjected my totality to much and more. I've made my body into an extension of a tower. Blended my soul and memories with those of another self.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005170_GRAHATIA<tab>オレもさ、自分を塔の端末にしたり、記憶と魂を重ねたり、
いろいろとやってきたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005180_GRAHATIA<tab>And each time, I would ask myself: what is it that makes me, me?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005180_GRAHATIA<tab>そのたびに、やっぱり考えたよ。
何が「自分」なのかってさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005190_M017<tab>Were you able to determine an answer?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005190_M017<tab>……答えは、出たのですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005200_GRAHATIA<tab>No. But that doesn't mean I'm confused. It simply means I'm the same as everyone else.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005200_GRAHATIA<tab>わかったことといえば、この問題はオレだけじゃなく、
きっと誰にもはっきりさせられないってことくらいだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005210_GRAHATIA<tab>So I posit this: who we were need not prescribe what we now hold in our hearts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005210_GRAHATIA<tab>……だからこそ、昨日までの自分を理由にして、
今、この心が思ってることを消す必要はないんだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005220_GRAHATIA<tab>Whatever came before, what matters most is the present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005220_GRAHATIA<tab>確かに紆余曲折あったが、オレは今が好きだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005230_GRAHATIA<tab>For me, that is being here with my friends. Full proud of how much we've grown together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005230_GRAHATIA<tab>みんなと一緒にここまで来られたことが、
命ひとつ張れるくらい、誇らしくて嬉しい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005240_GRAHATIA<tab>So I urge you to not give up. Heed your heart's desire, and hope that the future you long for shall be realized!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005240_GRAHATIA<tab>その心のままに望むんだ。
先を、未来を……また約束が果たされることを！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005250_M017<tab>I...cannot. We cannot.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005250_M017<tab>いいえ……ワタシにはできない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005260_M017<tab>We cannot understand desire, nor comprehend hope. We do not know how to create such things.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005260_M017<tab>欲求はわかりません、願望もわかりません。
それらを創出する方法すら、予測がつきません……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005270_GRAHATIA<tab>We're not unalike, you and I... I too have struggled to find the courage to express and embrace my wants.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005270_GRAHATIA<tab>うん……。
オレも、それを胸の奥からひっぱりだして、言葉にするまでに、
すごく時間と勇気が必要だったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005280_GRAHATIA<tab>If you like, I will tell you a tale. A tale of a world on the brink. Of a people who never gave up on the future.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005280_GRAHATIA<tab>そのときのことを、教えてやるよ。
壊れかけた世界から、明日を願った人々の、
冗談みたいな希望の話……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005290_GRAHATIA<tab>Of a man who realized his grandest dreams, and then awakened to a grander reality.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005290_GRAHATIA<tab>おやすみと、おはようの間に叶った望み。
まさしく「夢」の話をさ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005300_ALISAIE<tab>G'raha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005300_ALISAIE<tab>ラハ……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005310_ALISAIE<tab>You idiot... Just once... Just <var 1A 02 /var>once<var 1A 01 /var> stay with us to the end...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005310_ALISAIE<tab>馬鹿……一度くらい、最後まで見送る側でいなさいよね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005320_ALPHINAUD<tab>Did you find anything?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005320_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ、ふたりとも……何か発見はあったかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005330_ALISAIE<tab>No. This place is completely deserted, and I can't see how we're supposed to move on from here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005330_ALISAIE<tab>悔しいけど、収穫なしよ。
街はもぬけの殻だし、先へも進めそうにないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Neither can I. It's quite the quandary...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005340_ALPHINAUD<tab>私の方も同じだよ。
どうしたものだろうね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005350_ALPHINAUD<tab>There are no denizens to bar our path, yet there is no way forward.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005350_ALPHINAUD<tab>生命が絶滅した街……その再現……
想いを紡ぐ者がいないのに、行き止まりになっている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005360_ALISAIE<tab>For another mystery, we did find signs of very recent life. You'd swear everyone just vanished into thin air.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005360_ALISAIE<tab>生活の跡だけは、そのまま残ってたわよね。
ついさっきまで誰かがいたのに、フッと消えちゃったみたいに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005370_ALISAIE<tab>I wonder, how many ruined worlds like this has Meteion seen?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005370_ALISAIE<tab>……メーティオンは、こんな風に滅びた星を、
いったいいくつ見てきたのかしら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005380_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005380_ALPHINAUD<tab>ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005390_ALPHINAUD<tab>Could it be...? Yes... Yes, I believe I may have puzzled this out.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005390_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうか……だとしたら……わかったかもしれない……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Despite how it appears, it's no different this time. There is someone here who has wished for this ruin.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005400_ALPHINAUD<tab>ここが行き止まりになっている理由だよ。
今度もやはり、この場にいる者が、
終点であることを望んでいるからなんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005410_ALPHINAUD<tab>And I believe that, together, Alisaie and I can overcome their will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005410_ALPHINAUD<tab>そして恐らく……
私とアリゼーなら、それと相対する気持ちを貫ける。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>No! I won't allow it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>それだけは絶対に認められない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I promised your parents I'd keep you safe!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>両親からふたりを頼まれてる

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Stop─not another word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A9_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>もう、やめてくれ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005420_ALPHINAUD<tab>I'm afraid it has to be done. For our comrades, for everyone on Etheirys...and for myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005420_ALPHINAUD<tab>ここで諦めたくないんだ。
「暁」の皆や、アーテリスで待ってくれている人たち……
何よりも、自分のために。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005430_ALPHINAUD<tab>I know. I know...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005430_ALPHINAUD<tab>……その手は、ずるいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005440_ALPHINAUD<tab>But if there is a chance this will work, then I would take it. For everyone...and for myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005440_ALPHINAUD<tab>それでも、可能性を無視することはできないよ。
皆のために……自分のためにも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005450_ALPHINAUD<tab>I'm sorry, but there is a chance, and I must seize it. For everyone...and for myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005450_ALPHINAUD<tab>すまない……。
でも私は、どうしても、可能性を掴みたい。
皆のために……自分のためにも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005460_ALPHINAUD<tab>I will not pretend otherwise. I have my fears.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005460_ALPHINAUD<tab>ただ、不安がないわけじゃないんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005470_ALPHINAUD<tab>Not for myself, but for you. The last to remain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005470_ALPHINAUD<tab>私自身のことじゃなく……残される君のことだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005480_ALPHINAUD<tab>You are no stranger to carrying the burden of others.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005480_ALPHINAUD<tab>周りから託されたものを背負って進んでいくのは、
決して簡単なことじゃない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005490_ALPHINAUD<tab>But I can only imagine how heavy the weight would be this time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005490_ALPHINAUD<tab>君がついにひとりになったとき、
背負ったものは、いっそう重たく感じられるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005500_ALPHINAUD<tab>As your friend, I cannot bear the thought of making you suffer so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005500_ALPHINAUD<tab>私は、君をそんな風に苦しめてしまうことが、やるせない。
友人として……悔しいんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005510_ALISAIE<tab>Then why suggest such a thing!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005510_ALISAIE<tab>だったら託すんじゃないわよッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005520_ALISAIE<tab>It's too much to ask of anyone─even <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005520_ALISAIE<tab>私だって……背負わせたくなんかないわよ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005530_ALISAIE<tab>Why must <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> be the one? Why must <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> fight alone?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005530_ALISAIE<tab>なんでこの人が、ひとりぼっちで戦わなきゃいけないの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005540_ALISAIE<tab>More than a hero, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s a dear friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005540_ALISAIE<tab>この人は、大事な仲間で、英雄で……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005550_ALISAIE<tab>Not only to us, but to so many others. There are so many people in the world who care for you, and yet...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005550_ALISAIE<tab>私だって……みんなだって……
世界にはこんなに、あなたを想う人がいるのに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005560_ALISAIE<tab>And yet...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005560_ALISAIE<tab>どうして……っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005570_ALISAIE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005570_ALISAIE<tab>うっうっ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005580_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie. I have an idea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005580_ALPHINAUD<tab>アリゼー、実はね、とっておきの秘策があるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005590_ALPHINAUD<tab>Given the nature of this realm, it may be possible to do more than unbar our friend's path. We might also pave <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> a new one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005590_ALPHINAUD<tab>ここでは、想いだけが真実になる。
だとしたら、私たちは進路を拓くだけでなく、
もっと別の可能性も生み出せるんじゃないかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005600_ALPHINAUD<tab>For instance...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005600_ALPHINAUD<tab>たとえば、そう……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005610_ALPHINAUD<tab>A path where he finds happiness at journey's end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005610_ALPHINAUD<tab>「彼の行く先に、必ず、幸せな結末が待っている」

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005620_ALPHINAUD<tab>A path where she finds happiness at journey's end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005620_ALPHINAUD<tab>「彼女の行く先に、必ず、幸せな結末が待っている」

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005630_ALPHINAUD<tab>This much, I think we can believe with the utmost conviction. No matter how deep our despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005630_ALPHINAUD<tab>私たちならば、どんな絶望の中でも、
必ずそれを信じ抜けると思うのだけど……どうだい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005640_ALPHINAUD<tab>So please, believe in us too. And press on.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005640_ALPHINAUD<tab>君も……私たちを信じて、進んでくれるかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005650_ALPHINAUD<tab>ありがとう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005660_ALPHINAUD<tab>What are you─!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005660_ALPHINAUD<tab>わっ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005670_ALISAIE<tab>If the plan's decided, then let's not dally.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005670_ALISAIE<tab>作戦が決まったんだから、とっとと行くわよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005680_METEION<tab>Ah, there you are. It was as I said, was it not?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005680_METEION<tab>ほら、やっぱり戻ってきた。
誰も見つからなかったでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005690_ALPHINAUD<tab>It was. We couldn't find anyone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005690_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ、確かに君の言ったとおりだったよ。
しかし……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005700_ALPHINAUD<tab>But this place isn't entirely deserted, is it? You are here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005700_ALPHINAUD<tab>誰もいないどころか、目の前にいるじゃないか。
メーティオン……君がね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005710_ALPHINAUD<tab>You sought out a star of promise and found a ruined husk.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005710_ALPHINAUD<tab>君は、自分が到着したときにはもう、
この星は滅んでいたと言った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005720_ALPHINAUD<tab>Like us, you explored the devastation. Like us, you were stricken.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005720_ALPHINAUD<tab>きっと、私たちがしたように廃墟を巡って……
恐ろしくなったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005730_ALPHINAUD<tab>Horrified by the thought that so many lives could be snuffed out as if they were worth nothing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005730_ALPHINAUD<tab>これほどの痕跡を残しながら、
まるで他愛もないことのように、生命が絶えていることに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005740_ALPHINAUD<tab>And the thought that you would have to bear the terrible tidings to Hermes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005740_ALPHINAUD<tab>あるいはそれを知ったことで、ヘルメスのもとに、
絶望的な報告を持ち帰らざるを得なくなってしまったことに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005750_ALPHINAUD<tab>That which you saw and felt, you shared with your sisters. As did they share their own grim findings with you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005750_ALPHINAUD<tab>意識を共有している姉妹たちからも、
芳しくない結果が次々と届いたのだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Overcome by the pervasive despair of these stars, some of you inadvertently ushered their peoples to their ends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005760_ALPHINAUD<tab>壊れた星を嘆く者……。
住民の強い失意を受け取って、
彼らに終わりをもたらしてしまった者もいた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Knowing the horrors you know, anyone would feel the same. They would fear what lies ahead, and struggle to move forward.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005770_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうなれば、誰だって思うはずだ。
「進むのが怖い」とね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005780_METEION<tab>Fear... I had forgotten that such a thing existed, so focused have I been on shepherding despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005780_METEION<tab>……不思議ね。
いろいろな星の絶望を取り込みすぎて、
そんな想いがあったこと、すっかり忘れていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005790_ALPHINAUD<tab>If you can remember, then you can still face and overcome your own fear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005790_ALPHINAUD<tab>メーティオン……
その恐れを思い出せるなら、君はまだ踏みとどまれるはずだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005800_METEION<tab>Why would I bother with such an insignificant emotion? If the despair I command is as a raging river, then fear is but a trickling stream.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005800_METEION<tab>残念……私はね、濁流なの。
生を恨み、終焉を謳うものたちの想いを集めて、
うねり、うずまき、のたうちまわっている大河。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005810_METEION<tab>It can do nothing to alter my flow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005810_METEION<tab>あんなちっぽけな想いなんかじゃ、
思い出したところで、流れを変えられはしないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005820_METEION<tab>You spoke with the Ea, yes? Heard their tale of what awaits the universe?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005820_METEION<tab>ねえ、イーアたちから聞いたでしょう？
宇宙はいつか終わるってこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005830_METEION<tab>It's true. The stars grow colder and more distant. Eventually all will enjoy frozen solitude.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005830_METEION<tab>あれはね、本当よ。
星々は引き離されて、いずれ宇宙は完全に凍りつく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005840_METEION<tab>Using the power of dynamis, I am hastening that process.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005840_METEION<tab>私はデュナミスを使って、その流れを加速させているの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005850_METEION<tab>In so doing, nothing will be born ever again. Everyone will remain dead.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005850_METEION<tab>だって、ねえ、そうすれば……
もう二度と、何も「生まれない」でしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005860_METEION<tab>Alas, it will take time for that to happen. So in mercy I sent you my gift, to spare you needless suffering.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005860_METEION<tab>だけど、それにはまだまだ時間がかかるから、
みんなが無意味な苦しみを重ねないように、
ひとまず終末を贈ったの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005870_METEION<tab>Don't worry. Even if no living witnesses remain to mark the event, I'll make certain that Etheirys has a proper end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005870_METEION<tab>大丈夫、アーテリスの生命が絶えて、
成果を誰も見届けてくれなくなっても、
ちゃんとすべてを終わりにしてみせるから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005880_ALISAIE<tab>For all the power you wield, you're more fearful than the familiar you used to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005880_ALISAIE<tab>……あなた、大それたことができるようになったのに、
もとのメーティオンより、ずっと怖がりなのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005890_ALISAIE<tab>That Meteion feared simply to move forward, but your fear is such that you've given up on everything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005890_ALISAIE<tab>だってそうでしょ。
「進むのが怖い」どころじゃなくて、
すべてを諦めて、止めちゃおうとしてるんだから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005900_ALISAIE<tab>I know it well. That sense of defeat. I've tasted my fair share of it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005900_ALISAIE<tab>その気持ちはわかるわよ。
嫌ってくらい、味わってきたからね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005910_ALISAIE<tab>But as many times as we've fallen down, we've learned how to pick ourselves up and carry on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005910_ALISAIE<tab>けど私たちは、転ぶたび、
自分の力じゃどうしようもない壁があるって知るたびに、
立ち上がり方を学んできた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005920_ALISAIE<tab>We take each other's hand. Share in each other's courage. Follow in each other's footsteps. And turn sorrow into strength!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005920_ALISAIE<tab>手を差し伸べてもらって……勇気をわかちあって……
背中をおいかけて……悔しさを力に変えて……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005930_ALPHINAUD<tab>There are times when we fail. We bear wounds that do not heal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005930_ALPHINAUD<tab>結局できなかったことはある。
乾ききらない傷もある……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005940_ALPHINAUD<tab>But these experiences are part of life, and they make us stronger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005940_ALPHINAUD<tab>それも含めて、私たちが人生に刻んできた成長だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005950_ALPHINAUD<tab>(-Alphinaud and Alisaie-)We rise, fall, and rise again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005950_ALPHINAUD<tab>(-アルフィノとアリゼー-)だから私たちは、先へ進めるッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005960_ALISAIE<tab>We rise, fall, and rise again!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005960_ALISAIE<tab>だから私たちは、先へ進めるッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005970_ALISAIE<tab>Don't worry about us. You must take the next step, and all the rest after that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005970_ALISAIE<tab>大丈夫、任せて。
あなたは行くのよ……１歩でも、前へ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005975_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Earlier, in Old Sharlayan...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005975_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>しばらく前――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005980_TATARU<tab>Please... Please... Oh, please let them all be safe...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005980_TATARU<tab>みなさん……どうか……どうかご無事で……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005990_KRILE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_005990_KRILE<tab>ウッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006000_TATARU<tab>Krile? Are you all right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006000_TATARU<tab>クルルさん？
大丈夫でっすか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006010_KRILE<tab>It's nothing... Just a headache.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006010_KRILE<tab>ごめんなさい、ちょっと頭痛がしただけ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006020_KRILE<tab>They'll be fine... I know they will...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006020_KRILE<tab>大丈夫……まだ、大丈夫よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006030_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>Apologies for the interruption! A man arrived on the last ferry. An associate of the Scions!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006030_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>こ、こんなときに申し訳ございません！
今しがた、定期船が入港したのですが、そこに、その……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006040_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>He wishes to speak with you at once!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006040_IMMIGRATIONCONTROLSTAFF<tab>「暁の血盟」との面会を希望する者が……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006050_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>In this city devoid of life, you sense the presence of another...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006050_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>命なき街に、人の気配を感じる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006060_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>The sorrow of a thousand thousand worlds weighs heavy. And yet you can walk on.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006060_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>朽ちた星々から、一身に向けられる絶望は重い。
しかし、まだ歩けそうだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006070_METEION<tab>Here the path ends. There is no way to reach our nest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006070_METEION<tab>……本当に、ここでおしまい。
私たちの籠っている「<var 4A ((残骸)) ((レムナント)) /var>」に続く道はないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006080_METEION<tab>I told you. Resignation and acceptance reign in this place.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006080_METEION<tab>言ったでしょう？
ここに渦巻く想いたちは、命を肯定していない……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006090_METEION<tab>The rejection of life by those who came to curse it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006090_METEION<tab>みんな、がんばって生きてきたけど、
最後にはそれを呪ったのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006100_METEION<tab>Those whose dreams were unfulfilled. Whose prayers were unheard. Whose labors were unrewarded.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006100_METEION<tab>願いは叶わなかった……祈りは届かなかった……
ひとつたりとも、報われなかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006110_METEION<tab>Hope cannot deliver you unto hopelessness. Our refuge is beyond you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006110_METEION<tab>そんな想いが集っているのだもの、
「至るべき場所へ辿りつける」なんて可能性、
存在する余地もない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006120_METEION<tab>Always has it been. Such is the nature of this place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006120_METEION<tab>最初から……届くようになっていないのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006130_METEION<tab>You should have remained on Etheirys.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006130_METEION<tab>……だからアーテリスで待っていてほしかったのに。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006140_METEION<tab>Struggle will avail you naught, nor will it grant your comrades peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006140_METEION<tab>そうよ、立ち尽くしていても虚しいだけ。
あなたが足掻いていては、仲間たちの魂も安らぎを得られない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006150_METEION<tab>Come, let me relieve you of your burden. You have suffered enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006150_METEION<tab>終わりにしましょう、苦しみを。
それ以外に、何を望むというの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006155_ALL<tab>[MYRIAD VOICES] REPORT IF DISPLAYED
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006155_ALL<tab>（大勢の声出力用ラベル・翻訳不要）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006160_YSHTOLA<tab>Azem's magick. So long as our souls remain, you can use it to summon us back. But you mustn't.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006160_YSHTOLA<tab>魂さえ残っていれば  それで私たちを喚び戻せるかもしれない
でも駄目――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006170_THANCRED<tab>That's why...it's too soon for this to end.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006170_THANCRED<tab>この星はまだ  終わるには早すぎるんだよ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006180_KRILE<tab>You must triumph.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006180_KRILE<tab>必ず  勝って――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006190_BLOEWYDA<tab>Be safe, all of you. And come back.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006190_BLOEWYDA<tab>それで  全員無事に戻っておいで――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006200_AMON<tab>After all these years...is this the answer I was hoping for?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006200_AMON<tab>自分が  待っていたのは――
望んでいたのは  どんな答えだ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006210_VENAS<tab>So long as we remember, our fates remain ours to shape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006210_VENAS<tab>私たちは  何もできなくなったわけではありません

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006220_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Perhaps when our time comes to return to the star, we shall remember these few days we have lost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006220_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>だったら――いつか還ったときに思い出すのかな？
この  失われた時間のことをさ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006230_EMETSELCH<tab>Do not squander it. The legacy I leave you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006230_EMETSELCH<tab>私に託されたものを  投げ出すなよ――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I won't forsake our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ここで投げ出すものか

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll reach you! I'll find a way!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分は必ず、辿り着く……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006240_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)I bid them remember, but all this time, <var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> the one who had forgotten... A right fool you've made of me, Hermes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006240_EMETSELCH<tab>(-？？？？-)まったく……。
「覚えていろ」と言った方が忘れていただと？
とんだ道化を演じさせてくれたな、ヘルメスめ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006250_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)And to add insult to injury, I've been denied a sound rest, forced to watch this clamorous show.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006250_EMETSELCH<tab>(-？？？？-)おかげでおちおち眠れず、こいつの旅を見続けるハメになった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006260_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)Oh come now, it's been a gripping tale. Unbreakable bonds and noble sacrifice, sprinkled with moments of levity to counterbalance the pathos. It's got it all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006260_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-？？？？-)いいじゃない、とても見ごたえがあったよ。
みんなして、あんなメチャクチャな進み方するなんてさ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006270_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-???-)I for one would have been perfectly content to watch enraptured from the stalls...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006270_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>(-？？？？-)……だからこそ、だ。
ワタシたちだけこのまま消え失せるのは、ちょっと、ねぇ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006280_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>But I won't say no to a bit part!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006280_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>本当、喚んでもらえてよかったよ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006290_METEION<tab>What are you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006290_METEION<tab>あなたたち……何……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006300_EMETSELCH<tab>Half-faded souls of the dead. Isn't it painfully obvious?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006300_EMETSELCH<tab>何って、単なる消えかけの死人だよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006310_EMETSELCH<tab>Worry not─we haven't the power to defeat you. Nor is it our duty to do so. Not anymore.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006310_EMETSELCH<tab>心配せずとも、お前を斃すような力はない。
こいつに負けた時点で、主役は譲っているしな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006320_EMETSELCH<tab>That being said, we do have a score to settle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006320_EMETSELCH<tab>……だが、お前に一矢報いる、このときを待っていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006330_EMETSELCH<tab>So, here I am, Venat. I suppose you needed me to tie it all together, these frayed threads of our history─but knowing you, I suspect there's a joke in it too. Oh yes, I can imagine you gloating over my forgetfulness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006330_EMETSELCH<tab>ヴェーネス、あの負けず嫌いめ。
私をこの時代まで残しておいたのは、歴史を繋ぐためか、
終末の真相を忘れていたことへの当てつけか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006340_EMETSELCH<tab>Were I feeling charitable, I might assume you had left room for the possibility of this outcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006340_EMETSELCH<tab>至極好意的に解釈するのならば、
こんなオチが生じる可能性を残したのだろうが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006350_EMETSELCH<tab>Even so, you'll get no applause from me. A single gesture will not lighten the burden I've had to bear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006350_EMETSELCH<tab>何にせよ、その程度で掌を返すほど、私の人生は軽くなかった。
礼などくれてやるものか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006360_EMETSELCH<tab>Still, you must be commended. Our methods would not have brought mankind this far.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006360_EMETSELCH<tab>……しかし、人をここに至らせたこと。
この結末は、確かに私たちのやり方では掴み得なかったものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006370_EMETSELCH<tab>And so, as a show of respect to the last of us, I make this declaration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006370_EMETSELCH<tab>ならば賛辞と、最後の旧き人への手向けとして、
口上のひとつくらいは垂れてやろう……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006380_EMETSELCH<tab>You will not end our journey!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006380_EMETSELCH<tab>終焉を謳うものよ、私たちはお前によって終わらない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006390_EMETSELCH<tab>That is our answer! The answer of all lives of Etheirys, past and present!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006390_EMETSELCH<tab>それが、あの星の過去に生き、今を生きる者からの答えだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006400_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>As you've called us to the stage, so shall we perform. And creation magicks never fail to please.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006400_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>さて、せっかくお招きいただいたんだ。
ワタシたちで、ひとつ、創造魔法を披露しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006410_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Drawing upon the hopes of your comrades, we will make for you a new path.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006410_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>この場に満ちる、キミの仲間たちの想い……
それらを縒り合わせ、新たな道を紡ぎ出すのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006420_EMETSELCH<tab>What form said path takes depends on you. So focus─focus and envision that which rejects the claim that you cannot attain your goal!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006420_EMETSELCH<tab>とるべき形はお前が決めろ。
辿り着くことなどないと宣った、奴に示すにふさわしい形を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006430_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Ours is the wisdom to weave the fabric of reality...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006430_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>其は叡智……黎明の星を綾なす技……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006440_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Ours is the power to create!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006440_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>我らの御手は創世を為す……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006450_HERMES<tab>Meteion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006450_HERMES<tab>――メーティオン

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006460_HERMES<tab>Though I gave you these wings to soar the heavens, I did not teach you how to walk the earth. So loath was I to bind another living being.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006460_HERMES<tab>自分は君に翔び方を教えたが  歩き方は――
生命としての生き方は  到底教えられなかった

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006470_HERMES<tab>In the course of your long journey, you will learn from those you meet. Learn to walk and run and so much more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006470_HERMES<tab>しかし  永い永い旅の果てに
君はきっと  それを知る誰かに出会うだろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006480_HERMES<tab>A flower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006480_HERMES<tab>花を――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006490_HERMES<tab>Yes. Upon your return, I will gift you a beautiful flower.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006490_HERMES<tab>いつかこの旅をやり遂げた君に  心から花を贈ろう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006500_EMETSELCH<tab>These Elpis blooms serve as proof that this realm is not utterly devoid of hope. No more can you deny its power. No more is yours the dominion of despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006500_EMETSELCH<tab>その<var 4A ((希望)) ((エルピス)) /var>の花が在るかぎり、
元となった想いもまた「ここに在る」と証明される。
もはや、絶望だけの宙域には戻れまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006510_EMETSELCH<tab>In case the practical implications were lost on you, your comrades no longer need fight their fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006510_EMETSELCH<tab>お前の仲間たちの魂が、
いつまでも戦っている必要はなくなったと言ったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006520_EMETSELCH<tab>So, go on. Call them back to your side.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006520_EMETSELCH<tab>……喚び戻してやれ、お前とともに進む者たちを。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006530_HYDAELYN<tab>May you ever walk...in the light...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006530_HYDAELYN<tab>導きが、あらんことを…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006540_THANCRED<tab>How disappointing. Not even a single scar in the making to brag about.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006540_THANCRED<tab>……元どおりすぎて、いっそ格好がつかないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006550_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006550_ESTINIEN<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006560_ESTINIEN<tab>You'll find a way regardless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006560_ESTINIEN<tab>つける必要があるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006570_YSHTOLA<tab>Honestly... This is far more than any of us could have hoped for. Let us be thankful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006570_YSHTOLA<tab>まったくだわ。
こんな満点以上の結果をもたらしてくれたんですもの。
ありがたく受け取らないと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006580_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. That we thus stand reunited is a gift. Let us not squander it, and see that we all return to Etheirys.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006580_URIANGER<tab>皆で帰りましょう……
アーテリスで待っていてくれる方々のもとへ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006590_GRAHATIA<tab>Aye, as soon as we've averted the Final Days!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006590_GRAHATIA<tab>もちろん終末も止めて、な！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006600_ALISAIE<tab>Good to see you again. Our heroic sacrifice paid off, I take it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006600_ALISAIE<tab>ただいま。
……私たち、バッチリだったでしょ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006610_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come, my friends. Let us carry on and finish it─together.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006610_ALPHINAUD<tab>進もう、辿り着くべき結末へ。
今度こそ、みんなで！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's over, Meteion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>旅はここで終わりだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Come with us, Meteion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>一緒に帰ろう、メーティオン

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006620_METEION<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006620_METEION<tab>…！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006630_METEION<tab>Can you...hear me...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006630_METEION<tab>聞こえ……ますか……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006640_METEION<tab>The voices within... Crying in pain, wailing in sorrow... Hurting... Hurting...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006640_METEION<tab>わたしに、溶けた、みんな……
苦しくて、悲しくて、うずまいてる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006650_METEION<tab>End it...silence it... Silence our song of oblivion!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006650_METEION<tab>お願い……。
終わりを、終わらせてあげて……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006660_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>The way is open. They can proceed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006660_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>……ああ、流れができた。
これで彼らは先に進めそうだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006670_EMETSELCH<tab>So it seems.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006670_EMETSELCH<tab>そうだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006680_ALISAIE<tab>You're leaving!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006680_ALISAIE<tab>あなたたち、星海に還るつもり……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006690_EMETSELCH<tab>Of course. The encore is finished, and I will not suffer myself to live again by Hydaelyn's magick.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006690_EMETSELCH<tab>当然だ。
ハイデリンの術に生かされるなど、願い下げだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006700_EMETSELCH<tab>But more than that, the future you seek is not the past we loved. That is why we fought. And why I lost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006700_EMETSELCH<tab>……何より、お前たちが進む未来は、私の愛した過去じゃない。
だからこそお前たちと本気で、命を懸けて戦ったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006710_EMETSELCH<tab>But though you defeated me, my ideals are inviolate. Invincible.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006710_EMETSELCH<tab>その結果ならば、敗北であれ、覆すものか。
私が今の私であるかぎり、この想いは砕けない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006720_EMETSELCH<tab>Spare me your pity. I have no use for it. If you would do something for me─save our star.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006720_EMETSELCH<tab>間違っても哀れんでくれるなよ。
お前たちに望むことがあるとすれば、
あの忌々しい終末を打ち払うことだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006730_EMETSELCH<tab>See this tale to a triumphant conclusion, and with elation in your hearts, bid the final curtain fall.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006730_EMETSELCH<tab>そして勝鬨を喝采に代え、万感の想いとともに、幕を下ろせ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006740_EMETSELCH<tab>Only then may it rise again and a new tale begin─with new parts for all to play.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006740_EMETSELCH<tab>それでこそ、次の公演が始められるのだからな。
新たな舞台と新たな役で……お前たちも、私たちも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006750_EMETSELCH<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006750_EMETSELCH<tab>はぁ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006760_EMETSELCH<tab>Tell me, have you been to the ruins beneath the waters of the Bounty?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006760_EMETSELCH<tab>……お前、豊穣海に沈む海底遺跡に行ったことがあるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006770_EMETSELCH<tab>Or the treasure islands beyond the frozen waters of Blindfrost, in Othard's north?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006770_EMETSELCH<tab>オサード小大陸の北、
流氷に覆われたブラインフロストを超えた者のみが辿り着く、
秘宝の島を見たことは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006780_EMETSELCH<tab>The fabled golden cities of the New World? The sacred sites of the forgotten people of the south sea isles?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006780_EMETSELCH<tab>新大陸の、眩き黄金郷はどうだ？
南洋諸島に、忘れられた人々が遺した、神子像の祭祀場は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006790_EMETSELCH<tab>What about Meracydia, the southern continent? Do you know aught of its present state of affairs?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006790_EMETSELCH<tab>アラグの時代に蹂躙された南方大陸メラシディア、
その今を知っているか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006800_EMETSELCH<tab>...I thought not. Even of your little Eorzea, you know precious little. The true identities of the Twelve, for instance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006800_EMETSELCH<tab>エオルゼアにも、まだ知られざる真実がある。
お前たちが奉る「十二神」の正体なんぞがいい例だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006810_EMETSELCH<tab>All of which is to say: expand your horizons. Go forth and seek discovery. Some of the civilizations in the reflections will surprise you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006810_EMETSELCH<tab>あるいはもっと視野を広げてみろ。
鏡像世界のいくつかには、驚くべき文明が興っているからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006820_EMETSELCH<tab>As the bearer of Azem's crystal, you may consider your duty to see at least that much.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006820_EMETSELCH<tab>……アゼムのクリスタルを持つ者だろう？
それくらいは当然見ておけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006830_EMETSELCH<tab>I certainly did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006830_EMETSELCH<tab>……私は、見たぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006840_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006840_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>フフ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006850_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>I pray we meet again. If not in this life, then perhaps another.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006850_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>それじゃあ、またいつか会えることを願ってるよ。
お互い、違う形になってたとしてもさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006860_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Whensoever it should be, I trust it will be a most joyous reunion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006860_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>そのときは、何度でも、一緒に楽しくやろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006870_EMETSELCH<tab>For you, maybe. I want nothing to do with it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006870_EMETSELCH<tab>勝手に巻き込むな……私は厭だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006880_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>Oh, don't be that way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006880_HYTHLODAEUS<tab>えー、つれないなぁ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006890_METEION<tab>So you are finally here. In this place between death and rebirth, where life knows no dawn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006890_METEION<tab>――入ってきたのね
死と生の狭間  明けることなき命の淀みへ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006900_METEION<tab>Come, then. Follow me down into the darkest depths of despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006900_METEION<tab>私の軌跡を辿って
深く深く  底まで沈んでいらっしゃい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006910_METEION<tab>That you still stand... Your determination defies all reason.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006910_METEION<tab>まだ立っているなんて。
あなたたち、馬鹿みたいに心が強いのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006920_METEION<tab>The souls within me writhe and recoil in your presence...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006920_METEION<tab>その行進を見ていると、胸がざわざわするの。
私に溶けた先ゆく星々が、不快に思っているみたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006930_METEION<tab>What must I do? What pain must I visit upon you to make you surrender to despair?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006930_METEION<tab>ねえ、どうしたら絶望して、諦めてくれる？
何を見せたら、私たちと一緒になってくれるの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006940_ALISAIE<tab>No one is unbreakable. What pains one may weather may bring another to tears.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006940_ALISAIE<tab>私にだって、みんなにだって痛いところはある。
ただ、それが人それぞれで違ってるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006950_ALISAIE<tab>But therein lies our strength, for when we fall, our brothers and sisters are there to raise us up. Again and again. Without end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006950_ALISAIE<tab>だから誰かが立ち止まっても、ほかの人が手を引けるのよ。
終末を止めるまで……何度だってね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006960_METEION<tab>I see...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006960_METEION<tab>……そう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006970_METEION<tab>But no matter how much hope exists, ever will there be more despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006970_METEION<tab>(-メーティオンから滲む想い-)だが、絶望はいつだって、
希望よりもひとつ多く用意されているものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006980_EAA<tab>But no matter how much hope exists, ever will there be more despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006980_EAA<tab>だが、絶望はいつだって、
希望よりもひとつ多く用意されているものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006990_EAB<tab>But no matter how much hope exists, ever will there be more despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_006990_EAB<tab>だが、絶望はいつだって、
希望よりもひとつ多く用意されているものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007000_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>But no matter how much hope exists, ever will there be more despair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007000_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>だが、絶望はいつだって、
希望よりもひとつ多く用意されているものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007010_METEION<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007010_METEION<tab>(-メーティオンから滲む想い-)幾たび命は今日を悔み、明日を憂うぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007020_EAA<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007020_EAA<tab>幾たび命は今日を悔み、明日を憂うぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007030_EAB<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007030_EAB<tab>幾たび命は今日を悔み、明日を憂うぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007040_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>Ever will the living curse the present and lament the future.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007040_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>幾たび命は今日を悔み、明日を憂うぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007050_METEION<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007050_METEION<tab>(-メーティオンから滲む想い-)生ある時間の、果ての果てまで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007060_EAA<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007060_EAA<tab>生ある時間の、果ての果てまで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007070_EAB<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007070_EAB<tab>生ある時間の、果ての果てまで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007080_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>So shall we sing until life ceases to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007080_MASTERSTIGMAONE<tab>生ある時間の、果ての果てまで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007090_ALPHINAUD<tab>Seven hells!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007090_ALPHINAUD<tab>これは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>On your guard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007100_ESTINIEN<tab>来るぞ、構えろッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007110_ENDSINGER<tab>Ahhh, the rage... It rises... Rises...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007110_ENDSINGER<tab>ああ……疼く……怒りが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007120_ESTINIEN<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007120_ESTINIEN<tab>ぐあッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007130_METEION<tab>Stop!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007130_METEION<tab>(-？？？？-)やめて……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007140_METEION<tab>Calm yourself. Please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007140_METEION<tab>お願い、鎮まって……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007150_THANCRED<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007150_THANCRED<tab>ッ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007160_YSHTOLA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007160_YSHTOLA<tab>くは…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007170_ENDSINGER<tab>We die in pain. We die in suffering! Who are you to live? Who are you to hope!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007170_ENDSINGER<tab>何故、お前たちばかり、のうのうと生きている？
私たちは苦しんで絶えたのに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007180_URIANGER<tab>Hold on, my friends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007180_URIANGER<tab>おふたりとも、今……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007190_ALPHINAUD<tab>Urianger, watch out!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007190_ALPHINAUD<tab>ウリエンジェ、上だッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007200_URIANGER<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007200_URIANGER<tab>ハッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007210_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007210_ALPHINAUD<tab>ハァッ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007220_URIANGER<tab>Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007220_URIANGER<tab>アルフィノ様ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007230_ENDSINGER<tab>We cannot comprehend. We cannot know. We cannot know!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007230_ENDSINGER<tab>私たちが、こんなにも打ちひしがれているのに……
希望を語るというのか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007240_METEION<tab>Don't, please! Don't do this to them. To yourself!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007240_METEION<tab>その人たちを傷つけちゃダメ！
あなたも、もっと苦しくなる……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007250_ALISAIE<tab>Just one good strike.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007250_ALISAIE<tab>どうにか一撃……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007260_ALISAIE<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007260_ALISAIE<tab>っ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007270_ALISAIE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007270_ALISAIE<tab>うっ、あぁッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007280_METEION<tab>Stop. Please, stop!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007280_METEION<tab>止まって……お願い……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007290_ENDSINGER<tab>We will not suffer alone...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007290_ENDSINGER<tab>私たちばかり、惨めにはさせない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007300_ENDSINGER<tab>All will know our pain!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007300_ENDSINGER<tab>すべてを……彼方へ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007310_GRAHATIA<tab>No you don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007310_GRAHATIA<tab>させるか……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007320_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007320_GRAHATIA<tab>く…！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007330_ENDSINGER<tab>All awash in ice. A frozen waste. Forever silent!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007330_ENDSINGER<tab>何もかも……
永劫まで凍てつき、平らかな無となれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007340_ALISAIE<tab>Wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007340_ALISAIE<tab>待って……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007350_ALISAIE<tab>Don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007350_ALISAIE<tab>だめ……ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007360_ENDSINGER<tab>You gifted them escape.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007360_ENDSINGER<tab>仲間たちを逃がしたか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007370_ENDSINGER<tab>And rendered yourself powerless.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007370_ENDSINGER<tab>しかし、これで今度こそお前独りだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007380_ENDSINGER<tab>Bereft of the synergy you claim is your strength. Unless you mean to call upon the dead once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007380_ENDSINGER<tab>手を取り合うのがお前たちの強さだというなら、
今のお前はまさしく無力。
また死人にでも頼ってみるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007390_ENDSINGER<tab>Defiant to the last. But you will be one with us ere long.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007390_ENDSINGER<tab>フフ、最後の抵抗か！
いいぞ、もう間もなく、お前もこちら側に沈もうな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007400_ENDSINGER<tab>You will be battered and torn and made to crawl. You will weep and wail and curse your impotence. Curse your life as it fades.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007400_ENDSINGER<tab>打たれ、裂かれ、無様に地を這う。
嘆きながら果てるのだ、己の無力を……世のすべてを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007410_ENDSINGER<tab>As we did! As we died!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007410_ENDSINGER<tab>私たちもそうだった、ああ、そうだったとも！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007420_ENDSINGER<tab>Such pain and sorrow we felt... Such anguish and rage... We tried. We tried. But it was no use...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007420_ENDSINGER<tab>悲しかった、苦しかった、惨めだった、憎かった……
必死に生きて、でも駄目だった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007430_ENDSINGER<tab>Only when we surrendered did we find release. Only when we embraced death.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007430_ENDSINGER<tab>一緒に終わることだけが、
「みんな等しく幸せになれる方法」だったんだ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007440_ENDSINGER<tab>So join us in despair...and embrace yours!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007440_ENDSINGER<tab>さあ、お前も絶望に沈むがいい……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007450_ENDSINGER<tab>My Ultimatum... What is happening...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007450_ENDSINGER<tab>これは……私の巣に、何が起きている……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007460_ZENOS<tab>At the end of everything I find you, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007460_ZENOS<tab>ついに見つけたぞ、我が友よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007470_ZENOS<tab>I sought something in you, once. As you did in me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007470_ZENOS<tab>俺は解を得た。
この魂がお前に求めたこと……
そして、お前が俺に求めたことを探しあてたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007480_ZENOS<tab>When at last I understood what it was, I journeyed to Sharlayan to seek you out. Struck a bargain with the woman who shares your gift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007480_ZENOS<tab>ゆえに再戦を挑みに北洋へと出向き……
そこであの異能の小娘と、取引をした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007510_ZENOS<tab>In exchange for lending the Scions my aid, I was given the means to come hither.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007510_ZENOS<tab>「暁」が窮地にあれば、一度だけ手を貸すこと。
それを条件に、お前のいる天の果てへ向かうすべを得たのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007520_ZENOS<tab>Gorging upon what remained of the Mothercrystal, I reclaimed the form of the dragon. And hungry still for our reunion, I rode the light of the stars to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007520_ZENOS<tab>俺はマザークリスタルの残りを喰らい、
再び龍となって、星を渡った。
お前との戦いを想えば、光すら追い抜くのは造作もなかったぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007530_ZENOS<tab>I take it this is your prey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007530_ZENOS<tab>さて……あれがお前の獲物か。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007550_ZENOS<tab>But why does it still live? Surely it is no match for you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007550_ZENOS<tab>しかし、わからぬな。
なぜまだ倒せていない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007560_ZENOS<tab>I had assumed you would be above something so banal as despair. Am I mistaken?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007560_ZENOS<tab>邪悪も、絶望も、お前をその気にすらさせられないと、
俺に示していただろう。
あれは、偽りだったのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I don't want your help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前の力を借りてたまるか

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>If it comes to it, I won't save you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A12_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前だけは護るつもりはない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007570_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007570_ZENOS<tab>フッ
