source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007580_ZENOS<tab>And I'd rather not give it. Nay, I would have preferred that we enjoy a private reunion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007580_ZENOS<tab>ああ……。
俺も、お前とは仕合いたいのだ。
肩を並べるなど、興醒めにもほどがある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007590_ZENOS<tab>I care not. What I desire of you isn't succor. It is satisfaction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007590_ZENOS<tab>構わぬ。
俺がお前に望む行いは、ただ、刃を交えることのみ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007600_ZENOS<tab>So come, let us dispense with this distraction, you and I!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007600_ZENOS<tab>ゆえにこそ……この狩りにくれてやる刻はないッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007610_ENDSINGER<tab>You struggle in vain. You will not silence our song of oblivion!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007610_ENDSINGER<tab>何が来ようが、挫くだけだ。
私は、すべての終焉を謳い続ける……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007620_ENDSINGER<tab>You will never reach it. Will never reach the deliverance you seek.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007620_ENDSINGER<tab>お前たちは至らない
求めた結末になど  決して――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007630_ENDSINGER<tab>If this...was not the answer...then what is it? Where lies...happiness...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007630_ENDSINGER<tab>そんな――これが答えじゃないのなら――
どこに幸せが――あるというの――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007640_METEION<tab>No matter where we flew, there was only darkness and loneliness and pain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007640_METEION<tab>……どこまで翔んでも、暗くて、つらくて、寂しいの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007650_METEION<tab>We couldn't find the answers Hermes yearned for. The answers he deserved.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007650_METEION<tab>ヘルメスが望んでいたような、
優しい答えを見つけられなかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007660_METEION<tab>Greetings... You who are my final encounter...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007660_METEION<tab>こんにちは……私が出会える、最後のあなた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007670_METEION<tab>I wish to hear your words... Share your feelings... Know your thoughts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007670_METEION<tab>私は……あなたの音を聞き……想いを感じ……
考えを知りたいのです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007680_METEION<tab>May we please...be friends?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007680_METEION<tab>どうか、仲良く…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007690_METEION<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007690_METEION<tab>っ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007700_METEION<tab>Yes, I can see them... The memories of a long, long journey...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007700_METEION<tab>ああ……聞こえるわ……あなたの心が……
長い旅の、記憶が……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007710_METEION<tab>So many people... The thoughts of them overflowing in your heart...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007710_METEION<tab>たくさんの……こんなにたくさんの人がいて……
あふれるくらい、想いがあったのね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007720_METEION<tab>What they live for, what gives their lives meaning... There was never a single answer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007720_METEION<tab>たったひとつの答えなんて、本当になかったんだわ……。
命の意味も……生きる理由も……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007730_METEION<tab>You gather pieces of happiness, precious and fragile, only to lose them. Then start again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007730_METEION<tab>いろんな形の歓びを拾い集めては、失って……
また見つけながら生きて、生きて、生きていく……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007740_METEION<tab>On and on it goes, until death takes you into its gentle embrace.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007740_METEION<tab>死が、あなたの優しい隣人になる、そのときまで。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007750_METEION<tab>That which Hermes sent us to find...was there all this time. On Etheirys.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007750_METEION<tab>私が翔ばなくたって、ヘルメスの探してたものは、
あの星に、あなたの世界にあったのね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It wasn't always there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>最初からあったわけじゃない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>We created it together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A13_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>世界は、みんなで作ってきたんだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007760_METEION<tab>Like a field of flowers, perhaps. At first a single blossom, it spreads and takes on more colors.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007760_METEION<tab>花畑のようね。
少しずつ、色を混ぜながら広がって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007770_METEION<tab>Thank you for guiding me here. To find these words at journey's end fills me with joy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007770_METEION<tab>その言葉まで辿りつけてよかった……。
私の旅に、素敵な終点をありがとう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007780_METEION<tab>And so, before I fall forever silent, there is one thing I must do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007780_METEION<tab>……だからこそ、消える前に始めなくちゃ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007790_METEION<tab>No expression of regret will undo what my sisters and I have done. Will restore what we have stolen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007790_METEION<tab>私たちが奪ったものは、もう、決して戻らない。
そのことを、許してとは言わない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007800_METEION<tab>But if you would allow it, I would sing one last song. A song of the newfound joy that swells in my heart...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007800_METEION<tab>ただ、一度だけ謳わせてほしいの……。
今度は自分自身の心を……私が見つけた歓びを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007810_METEION<tab>Of the beauty of light when it shines across a dark and starless sea...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007810_METEION<tab>たとえば、星のない暗い海に差す光が、
こんなに、こんなに綺麗だってこと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007820_METEION<tab>Of a dream that from the soil of worlds now lost to sorrow, life will spring forth once more...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007820_METEION<tab>生きる者を失くした星に……悲しみに荒れた大地に……
いつかまた、命が巡って芽吹くよう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007830_METEION<tab>...Nourished by gentle rains and caressed by uplifting winds. A song of hope.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007830_METEION<tab>雨として降り注ぎ、風として舞い上がる、希望の唄を……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007840_METEION<tab>One day, life will fill the universe again. And Hermes will see this and smile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007840_METEION<tab>命が満ちたら、ヘルメスにも、見てもらえるといいな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007850_METEION<tab>How, I do not know. But I do know that, where there is a will, there is a way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007850_METEION<tab>難しいのは、わかってるけど……
<var 4A ((可能性)) ((デュナミス)) /var>は、いつだって想いを叶えようとしてる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007860_METEION<tab>After all, miracles happen every day, do they not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007860_METEION<tab>奇跡だって、ときどきは、起きるかもしれないよね……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007870_METEION<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007870_METEION<tab>えへへ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007880_METEION<tab>I will create a path back to your ship, where your dear friends await.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007880_METEION<tab>じゃあ、最後に……
あなたの大切な仲間のいる船まで、道を繋げるね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007890_METEION<tab>Hold in your heart your desire to return to them, then follow my lead and walk forth.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007890_METEION<tab>あなたはわたしに続いて、
帰りたいって強く願いながら、踏み出して。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007900_METEION<tab>That hope will surely guide you true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007900_METEION<tab>その想いが、必ず、みんなのところへ導いてくれるから……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007910_ZENOS<tab>You mean to return. To the world where you are hailed as a hero.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007910_ZENOS<tab>……戻るのか。
お前を、英雄たらしめる世界に。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007920_ZENOS<tab>Hear me then. Not as a hero, but as simply...you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007920_ZENOS<tab>ならば、ここで聞け……ただのお前としてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007930_ZENOS<tab>As I learned in Ala Mhigo, you are a formidable foe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007930_ZENOS<tab>……あのアラミゴでの決戦で、
俺は何に歓喜したのかと、考えていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007940_ZENOS<tab>Stronger than any I have faced. Against you, I need bring my all to bear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007940_ZENOS<tab>お前が比類なき強敵であったこと。
最後の一息すら絞り出すような戦いができたこと。
すなわち……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007950_ZENOS<tab>I need burn through the candle of my life.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007950_ZENOS<tab>己が命を、燃やすことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007960_ZENOS<tab>This is the sole pleasure I know, and it is the sole pleasure I have to share.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007960_ZENOS<tab>それが俺の歓びであり、
同時に、俺からお前に渡し得る唯一の愉しみだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007970_ZENOS<tab>And so I come before you. To issue challenge and offer singular bliss.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007970_ZENOS<tab>ゆえにこそ、俺は今一度、お前に再戦を申し入れる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007980_ZENOS<tab>If you wish to walk away, I will not stop you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007980_ZENOS<tab>応じぬのであれば、そのまま仲間のもとへ帰るがいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007990_ZENOS<tab>You value life. You do not burn yours save for reasons you deem worthy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_007990_ZENOS<tab>なにせ人は命を尊ぶ。
それを危険にさらすこと、無暗に費やすことは、
望んでするなというのが道理らしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008000_ZENOS<tab>Reasons such as those which brought you here. The salvation of a world and its people. The motives of a hero true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008000_ZENOS<tab>あるいは英雄たるお前も、人命を護らんという一心で、
こんな果てへと至ったのやもしれぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008010_ZENOS<tab>But there is more to you than that. You know this to be true.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008010_ZENOS<tab>だが、ここに……外からお前を定めるものは、何もない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008020_ZENOS<tab>As surely as you know the thrill of pushing your body and soul to their limits. Of confronting ever-mightier foes, dancing ever closer to the precipice, wondering if this will be the one to finally, finally...fill the void.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008020_ZENOS<tab>思い出せ……！
武器を手にし、技を会得したときの高揚を。
新たな脅威、いまだ踏破せぬ頂を目にしたときの欲を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008030_ZENOS<tab>Such pleasures, you seek for their own sake, and no other reason. Is this not so...<var 1A 02 /var>adventurer<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008030_ZENOS<tab>命を費やさねば得られぬ歓びがあったはずだ。
なあ……「冒険者」よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>That, I can't deny.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>……まったくそのとおりだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Think what you will. But I'm not letting you leave this place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>どうあれお前を、あの星には帰さない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I've had enough of you. It ends here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A14_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>いい加減、お前にはうんざりだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008040_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008040_ZENOS<tab>フ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008050_ZENOS<tab>Acceptance. At long last.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008050_ZENOS<tab>では、勝負といくか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008060_ZENOS<tab>The conflagration of our clash will scorch even the stars!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008060_ZENOS<tab>俺とお前の命で……
天つ星、そのすべてを焦がそうぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008070_ZENOS<tab>So you would still play the hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008070_ZENOS<tab>……あくまで英雄であることを貫くか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008080_ZENOS<tab>No matter. In acceptance you betray your deception. You know full well what we are, and what we seek.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008080_ZENOS<tab>それでも構わぬ……
お前が受けて立つというのならば、戦いの中で知らしめよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008090_ZENOS<tab>To shine incandescent in death's shadow!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008090_ZENOS<tab>命を懸ける歓び、その熱を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008095_ZENOS<tab>Finally mustered the desire to kill me, have you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008095_ZENOS<tab>……ハ。
やっと本気で俺を殺すつもりになったか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008096_ZENOS<tab>Go on, then. Try and strike me down in this forsaken place. I shall return the favor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008096_ZENOS<tab>ならば、この最果てに、俺の骸を打ち捨てるがいい。
こちらもお前を仕留める気でいく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008097_ZENOS<tab>Aye, let us indulge in the only worthwhile pursuit, and burn our lives to their ends!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008097_ZENOS<tab>命のすべてを削ぎ切って、最期の愉しみに耽ようぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008100_ZENOS<tab>Come, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008100_ZENOS<tab>さあ  来い――！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008110_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008110_ZENOS<tab>っ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008120_ZENOS<tab>That I should lose again...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008120_ZENOS<tab>ああ……俺はまた、負けたのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008130_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008130_ZENOS<tab>クク、フフフフ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008140_ZENOS<tab>How disappointing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008140_ZENOS<tab>…………悔しいものだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008150_ZENOS<tab>Never have I understood those around me. Understood their obsessions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008150_ZENOS<tab>俺は終ぞ……
周りが執着しているものの価値が、わからなかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008160_ZENOS<tab>Besieged by their banality, the world was a mire of tedium and trivialities.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008160_ZENOS<tab>世の中はどれも、泥のような……
退屈で……醜く……くだらないものだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008170_ZENOS<tab>But in these fleeting moments, there is...a spark. Blinding, brilliant...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008170_ZENOS<tab>だが……時折……こうして火が……
愉しみがもたらされる……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008180_ZENOS<tab>Gone...too soon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008180_ZENOS<tab>まったく……憎いものよ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008190_ZENOS<tab>What of you, my mirror? Born into this world, bestowed name, bid to seek out strife and adventure...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008190_ZENOS<tab>お前は、どうだった……
この世界に生み落とされ、名を与えられ、生きてきて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008200_ZENOS<tab>Was this life a gift...or a burden?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008200_ZENOS<tab>歩いてきて……何を思った……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008210_ZENOS<tab>Did you find...fulfillment?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008210_ZENOS<tab>存分に、愉しかったか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008220_ZENOS<tab>I...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008220_ZENOS<tab>……俺は…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008230_ZENOS<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008230_ZENOS<tab>……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008240_ESTINIEN<tab>Can you hear... Say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008240_ESTINIEN<tab>おい――か――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008250_URIANGER<tab>...must tend to...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008250_URIANGER<tab>すぐ――を――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008260_GRAHATIA<tab>Open your... ...please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008260_GRAHATIA<tab>――くれ――頼む――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008270_YSHTOLA<tab>Someone...hand...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008270_YSHTOLA<tab>手を――して――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008280_ALPHINAUD<tab>Please...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008280_ALPHINAUD<tab>どうか――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008290_ALISAIE<tab>[SOBBING] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008290_ALISAIE<tab>うっ、うう、ひっく

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008300_ALISAIE<tab>You can't leave us... Not like this...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008300_ALISAIE<tab>(-？？？？-)なんで……目を開けてよ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008310_ALISAIE<tab>If you do, I'll never forgive you... So, come on! Open your eyes and get up!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008310_ALISAIE<tab>(-？？？？-)あんな別れ方、絶対許さないんだから……！
ねえ、起きなさいよ……っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008320_ALISAIE<tab>[GASP] Report if displayed
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008320_ALISAIE<tab>っ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Are you...are you with us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008330_ALPHINAUD<tab>君、目が覚めたのかい……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008340_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank the heavens... For a moment we thought...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008340_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ……よかった……本当によかった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_Q15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Is everyone all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>みんな、無事……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Am I really alive?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_A15_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分、生きてる……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008350_GRAHATIA<tab>After what you've done, you're the last person...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008350_GRAHATIA<tab>何言ってるんだよ、あんたがいちばん……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008360_GRAHATIA<tab>...To be asking that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008360_GRAHATIA<tab>いちばん……無事じゃ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008370_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008370_GRAHATIA<tab>う…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008380_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes, you're alive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008380_GRAHATIA<tab>ああ、ちゃんと生きてる……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008390_GRAHATIA<tab>You're alive...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008390_GRAHATIA<tab>生きてる……けど……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008400_GRAHATIA<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008400_GRAHATIA<tab>う…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008410_GRAHATIA<tab>You... How can you keep your promise if you're not here?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008410_GRAHATIA<tab>約束……あんたがいなくちゃ、守れないだろ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008420_ESTINIEN<tab>Another fine show you've put on, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008420_ESTINIEN<tab>よう、また大活躍だったな……相棒。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008430_YSHTOLA<tab>A fine show indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008430_YSHTOLA<tab>どうにかなったからよかったものの……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008440_YSHTOLA<tab>What were you thinking, fighting alone? Never do that again. My poor heart couldn't bear it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008440_YSHTOLA<tab>ひとりで戦おうなんて無茶、二度とよして頂戴。
こちらの心臓がもたないわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008450_THANCRED<tab>Put yourself in our place. If you hadn't returned, how do you think we would feel? And if that sounds harsh...it's because we care.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008450_THANCRED<tab>まったくだ、急に飛ばされた俺たちの身にもなってみろ。
お前が戻らなかったら、後悔どころの話じゃなかったぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008460_URIANGER<tab>We tended to thy wounds as best we could, but how is the pain?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008460_URIANGER<tab>手当てはできていると思うのですが……
痛みはいかがですか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008470_URIANGER<tab>That is gladdening. Grievous as thine injuries were, however, I would counsel repose for a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008470_URIANGER<tab>よかった……。
ですが酷い怪我でしたから、しばし安静に……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008480_ALISAIE<tab>Gladdening!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008480_ALISAIE<tab>よくない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008490_ALISAIE<tab>There's nothing gladdening about this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008490_ALISAIE<tab>全然、ちっとも、ひとつもよくない……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008500_ALISAIE<tab>When Meteion appeared in here and told us that you were right behind her, we all got our hopes up. But you never came!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008500_ALISAIE<tab>ここにメーティオンが来て、あなたが帰ってくるはずだって……
なのに全然帰ってこないし……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008510_ALISAIE<tab>And when you finally deign to appear, you're within an ilm of your life!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008510_ALISAIE<tab>やっと転移してきたと思ったら、
意味わかんないくらいボロボロだし……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008520_ALISAIE<tab>Damn you! Damn you for making us worry!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008520_ALISAIE<tab>バカ……ッ！
本当に……心配したんだから……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008530_LIVINGWAY<tab>Ah, those were cries of celebration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008530_LIVINGWAY<tab>みなさんがご無事で何よりですわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008540_LIVINGWAY<tab>Anyway, what the important thing is that you're all alive and in reasonably good health, and we mean to get you back that way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008540_LIVINGWAY<tab>わたくしたちも、引き続き安全運転で参ります。
どうぞ最後まで、ごゆっくりお過ごしください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008550_LIVINGWAY<tab>As for your earlier request, I'm quite certain we're in range to make contact now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008550_LIVINGWAY<tab>それから、ご質問いただいていた件ですが……
そろそろ通信が届く圏内かと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008560_THANCRED<tab>Ah, excellent. Let us announce our return at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008560_THANCRED<tab>お、そいつは朗報だ。
さっそく各国に連絡してやろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008570_THANCRED<tab>I hope you're ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008570_THANCRED<tab>凱旋の準備、しておけよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008580_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008580_ALPHINAUD<tab>フフ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008590_ALPHINAUD<tab>While you were unconscious, we set out from Ultima Thule, you see.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008590_ALPHINAUD<tab>君が気を失っている間に、
ラグナロクはウルティマ・トゥーレを出てね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Can you stand? If so, you may wish to see what's outside.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008600_ALPHINAUD<tab>もう立てるかい？
よければ外を見てほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008610_ALPHINAUD<tab>We're home, my friend. We're home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008610_ALPHINAUD<tab>帰ってきたのさ、私たちの星へ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008620_ERENVILLE<tab>Is that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008620_ERENVILLE<tab>あれは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008630_ERENVILLE<tab>It is! It's the <var 1A 02 /var>Ragnarok<var 1A 01 /var>! They're back!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008630_ERENVILLE<tab>間違いない、ラグナロクだ。
戻ってきたぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008640_WILFSUNN<tab>Thank heavens...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008640_WILFSUNN<tab>よかった…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008650_BLOEWYDA<tab>Truly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008650_BLOEWYDA<tab>本当にね

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008660_SICARD<tab>Yes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008660_SICARD<tab>よっしゃあ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008670_EMMANELLAIN<tab>They've done it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008670_EMMANELLAIN<tab>よっしゃあ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008680_SOROBAN<tab>Welcome home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008680_SOROBAN<tab>おかえりぃ～

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008690_HOARYBOULDER<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008690_HOARYBOULDER<tab>うおおおお！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008700_CID<tab>Yes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008700_CID<tab>よしっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008710_FOURCHENAULT<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008710_FOURCHENAULT<tab>っ…

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008720_KRILE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008720_KRILE<tab>はー

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008730_TATARU<tab>Welcome home, everyone!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008730_TATARU<tab>みなさん、おかえりなさい……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008740_TATARU<tab>Welcome home!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008740_TATARU<tab>おかえりなさいっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dearest Mother, Dearest Father...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008750_ALPHINAUD<tab>親愛なるお父様  お母様へ――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008760_ALPHINAUD<tab>This letter will be the very last that I write to you from the Rising Stones.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008760_ALPHINAUD<tab>これはきっと  石の家でしたためる
最後の手紙になるでしょう

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008770_ALPHINAUD<tab>As I commit these words to parchment, I fondly recall my journey as a Scion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008770_ALPHINAUD<tab>文字を綴りながら
「暁」としての日々を思い返しています

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008780_ALPHINAUD<tab>From the time I first walked into the order's former halls...to the time I set forth to forestall the Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008780_ALPHINAUD<tab>ここに初めてやってきたときのこと
――そして  終末に立ち向かったときのことも

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008790_ALPHINAUD<tab>At the farthest reaches of the sea of stars, we fought the battle of our lives...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008790_ALPHINAUD<tab>私たちは  遥か遠い天の果てで
戦いを繰り広げましたが――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Fought against despair itself─a veritable maelstrom of it fed by the resignation that dwelled in the hearts of beings not so unlike ourselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008800_ALPHINAUD<tab>あの絶望の海は  誰かの胸の内にあったのかもしれない
――ふと  そんな風に思ったのです

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Full oft have I harbored the same malaise. Have I been brought to my knees, crushed by the weight of sorrow and defeat, convinced that I will never rise again.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008810_ALPHINAUD<tab>事実  私も  これまで幾度となく打ちひしがれ
悲しみに暮れ  挫けかけました

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008820_ALPHINAUD<tab>However...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008820_ALPHINAUD<tab>けれど――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008830_ALPHINAUD<tab>I have also known many moments of unbridled joy and happiness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008830_ALPHINAUD<tab>振り返れば確かに  笑っていた日があったのです

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008840_ALPHINAUD<tab>By this truth do I find hope within, blooming resplendent like the Elpis flower.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008840_ALPHINAUD<tab>たったそれだけの事実が  あの希望の花と同じく
確かに咲き誇っています

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008850_ALPHINAUD<tab>And thus do I endure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008850_ALPHINAUD<tab>だからこそ  私は――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008860_ALPHINAUD<tab>Do I look forward to creating more memories with my friends and loved ones.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008860_ALPHINAUD<tab>出会った人と  またこれから出会う人と  笑い合いたい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008865_ALPHINAUD<tab>For from these fertile seeds, yet more hope shall spring forth...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008865_ALPHINAUD<tab>新たな花を咲かすように
あるいは――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008870_ALPHINAUD<tab>And they will grow to become shining lights that illuminate the dark.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008870_ALPHINAUD<tab>暗闇に  希望の灯火をともすように

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thus believing, I leave the Rising Stones behind, as will my comrades.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008880_ALPHINAUD<tab>そう願いながら  間もなく  石の家を発ちます

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008890_ALPHINAUD<tab>For as we have decided after careful deliberation...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008890_ALPHINAUD<tab>先日  皆で話し合ったとおり――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008900_ALPHINAUD<tab>We are disbanding the Scions of the Seventh Dawn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008900_ALPHINAUD<tab>「暁の血盟」は  解散するのです

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008910_TATARU<tab>There you are, Alphinaud!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008910_TATARU<tab>あっ、アルフィノさん！
こちらにいらしたんでっすね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008920_TATARU<tab>Everyone is already gathered in the foyer!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008920_TATARU<tab>みなさん、エントランスホールの方に、
もう集まってらっしゃいまっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008930_ALPHINAUD<tab>My apologies. I'll be right there.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008930_ALPHINAUD<tab>おっと、すぐに行くよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008940_ALPHINAUD<tab>At least...that is what the story will be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008940_ALPHINAUD<tab>とはいえ  それは表向きの話――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008950_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sorry to keep you all waiting.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008950_ALPHINAUD<tab>遅くなってすまない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008960_ALISAIE<tab>What could you possibly have left to do now?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008960_ALISAIE<tab>こんなときに何してたのよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Oh, just a letter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008970_ALPHINAUD<tab>ちょっと、手紙をね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008980_THANCRED<tab>I imagine it will be a while before we can gather like this again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008980_THANCRED<tab>こうして顔を合わせる機会も、しばらくなくなりそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008990_YSHTOLA<tab>So it must be if we're to keep up appearances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_008990_YSHTOLA<tab>「暁」は終末の収束をもって解散……
以後はグランドカンパニー・エオルゼアをはじめ、
国際組織が中心となって、諸問題の解決にあたる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009000_YSHTOLA<tab>From now on, it falls to the Grand Company of Eorzea and its allies to deal with the realm's crises.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009000_YSHTOLA<tab>対外的にはそういう風になっているのだもの、
これまでどおりに集まっていたら台無しだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009010_URIANGER<tab>Meanwhile, we shall return to our erstwhile ways.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009010_URIANGER<tab>されどその実態は、原点への回帰……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009020_URIANGER<tab>Retreating from plain sight to take our place in the shadows once more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009020_URIANGER<tab>ミンフィリアが立ち上げた当初の、
秘密結社という形に戻って、私たちの活動は続くのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009030_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. For the foreseeable future, I expect that we must work independently as we seek out problems that want for solving.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009030_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうだね。
当面は、それぞれで世界を見回りながら、
取り組むべき問題を探していくことになるが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009040_ALPHINAUD<tab>But a day will come when we face another great challenge. And we will face it together, as we always have.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009040_ALPHINAUD<tab>いずれまた、大きな困難に挑むこともあるだろう。
今よりもっと成長した、私たち皆でね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009050_KRILE<tab>As much as I look forward to that day, I do hope it doesn't come any time soon...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009050_KRILE<tab>待ち遠しいような……
そういう事態は起きない方がいいような……複雑ねぇ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009060_ESTINIEN<tab>Well, formal association or no, if any of you should require my services, you need but ask.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009060_ESTINIEN<tab>まあ、集まるだなんだと大ごとにせずとも、
力が必要になったら呼べ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009070_ESTINIEN<tab>I'll be glad to keep my lance arm honed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009070_ESTINIEN<tab>どのみち、槍を錆びさせるつもりはないからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009080_THANCRED<tab>I'll hold you to that, so you had better keep your linkpearl on hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009080_THANCRED<tab>言ったな……？
なら、「暁」のリンクパールは、捨てずにしっかり持ってろよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009090_ALISAIE<tab>So, you really mean to stay, Tataru?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009090_ALISAIE<tab>タタルは、ここに残るんだっけ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009100_TATARU<tab>Someone has to keep the Rising Stones in proper order, and even a super-secret organization requires a super-secret base of operations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009100_TATARU<tab>はいでっす！
秘密結社といえど拠点は必要でっすし、
そうなると、誰かが建物の手入れをしないと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009110_TATARU<tab>To the rest of the world, it will be naught more than a workshop for Eorzea's foremost up-and-coming artisan!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009110_TATARU<tab>ということで、「石の家」は表向き、
新進気鋭の職人タタルの工房となりまっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009120_TATARU<tab>If you thought our coffers were full to bursting before, just wait till I can devote myself wholly to the crafts.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009120_TATARU<tab>よりいっそう、がっぽり稼いで丸儲け、でっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009130_ALISAIE<tab>Plotting to build a mercantile empire to rival that of Lord Lolorito, are we?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009130_ALISAIE<tab>……知らないうちに、お店か何かにされてそうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009135_GRAHATIA<tab>[LAUGHS] Report if displayed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009135_GRAHATIA<tab>ハハ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009140_GRAHATIA<tab>I, for one, look forward to your future successes, Tataru, as do I our next meeting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009140_GRAHATIA<tab>オレ、楽しみにしてるよ。
みんなと、次に会える日をさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009150_TATARU<tab>And with that, I believe it is past time you all made ready to depart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009150_TATARU<tab>ではでは、みなさん出発のお仕度を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009160_TATARU<tab>Leave no preparations undone or words unsaid, all right? Now, off with you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009160_TATARU<tab>しばしのお別れになる方もいらっしゃるでしょうから、
今のうちに、しっかり挨拶をしておくでっす！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009170_ALISAIE<tab>I suppose we're off to Garlemald, then.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009170_ALISAIE<tab>さてと……
私とアルフィノは、ひとまずイシュガルドに行くわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009180_ALISAIE<tab>Though we ought to speak with Lord Aymeric first. If he's received word of any recent developments, we need to know.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009180_ALISAIE<tab>ガレマルドに残ってる派遣団からの最新の報告書が、
アイメリク総長のところにも届いてるんですって。
それを見せてもらうの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009190_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Twould be prudent to purchase some warmer clothes at least. Mayhap we can pick up a few souvenirs for Jullus and the others while we're at it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009190_ALPHINAUD<tab>ついでに、防寒具も調達したいところだね。
ユルスたちへのお土産も、何か探してみよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009200_ALISAIE<tab>Where will you all be heading next?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009200_ALISAIE<tab>みんなは？
このあとどうするの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009210_YSHTOLA<tab>Dravania. There is a book I have been meaning to borrow from the Great Gubal Library.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009210_YSHTOLA<tab>私は、低地ドラヴァニアに行くわ。
探している本が、グブラ幻想図書館にありそうなの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009220_YSHTOLA<tab>And I can think of at least one person who will be most displeased should I fail to visit before leaving.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009220_YSHTOLA<tab>ついでに、ひとり暮らしの頑固な老人の様子も、
見てくるつもりよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009230_THANCRED<tab>We've no particular destination in mind, but we do intend to stop in Sharlayan before we set off.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009230_THANCRED<tab>俺たちは、あてがある旅じゃないが……
ひとまずオールド・シャーレアンだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009240_URIANGER<tab>We had thought to ask after the Loporrits. I am curious as to how well those who chose to remain are adapting to their changed circumstances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009240_URIANGER<tab>ええ、一度、レポリットたちの様子を見ておきたいのです。
まだかの地に滞在している者がいるようですので……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009250_KRILE<tab>Might we accompany you, then? Raha and I were planning to return to the Baldesion Annex.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009250_KRILE<tab>だったら、途中までご一緒させてもらえる？
私たちはバルデシオン分館に戻る予定なの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009260_GRAHATIA<tab>Commissions have been piling up in our absence, and they must be dealt with ere we begin our work in earnest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009260_GRAHATIA<tab>最近きた依頼が、いくつか溜まってるらしいからな。
まずはそれの確認から始めるつもりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009270_ALPHINAUD<tab>Estinien. You will return to Radz-at-Han, will you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009270_ALPHINAUD<tab>エスティニアンは、ラザハンかい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009280_ESTINIEN<tab>Aye. For Vrtra's benefit, though I've yet to hear the details. I may not stay long.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009280_ESTINIEN<tab>ああ……。
もっとも、ヴリトラから肝心の用件は聞いてないからな。
そこに留まるとも限らないが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009290_ALPHINAUD<tab>I see. Then it is here the Scions at last part ways, each to some far-flung corner of the realm.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009290_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうか……。
となると、皆行く方向はバラバラだし、
ここでお別れということになりそうだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009300_YSHTOLA<tab>Perhaps. But I believe one of our number─a rather important one, at that─has yet to divulge <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> plans.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009300_YSHTOLA<tab>……その前に、いちばん肝心なことを、
まだ聞いていないのではなくて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009310_ESTINIEN<tab>Quite right.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009310_ESTINIEN<tab>お前は……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009320_URIANGER<tab>Indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009320_URIANGER<tab>あなたは……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009330_GRAHATIA<tab>Fair point!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009330_GRAHATIA<tab>あんたは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009340_ALPHINAUD<tab>So. What's next for our humble adventurer?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009340_ALPHINAUD<tab>君は、今日、何をするんだい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009350_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)The constancy of this place never ceases to amaze me. An ocean of souls, shimmering and eternal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009350_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-？？？？-)いつ訪れようと、ここは変わらないな。
満ちた命は輝き、たゆたう時を生き続ける。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009360_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)And yet...something stirs...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009360_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-？？？？-)だが……感じる、何かが蠢いているような……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009370_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Yes... Steeped in darkness deep as starless night, the beast hungers.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009370_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-？？？？-)地の底より深く、星なき夜より昏いところ……
数多の魔を繋ぐ万魔殿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009380_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Alas, I dare not investigate in earnest before the coming of my guiding star, as he foretold.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009380_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-？？？？-)何が起きているのか、早急に突き止めたいところだが……。
本格的に動くのは、彼が到来を予言した、
「星」との出会いを果たしてからかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009390_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Alas, I dare not investigate in earnest before the coming of my guiding star, as she foretold.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009390_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-？？？？-)何が起きているのか、早急に突き止めたいところだが……。
本格的に動くのは、彼女が到来を予言した、
「星」との出会いを果たしてからかな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009400_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)We shall descend to the depths, you and I, to confront the dread beast Pandæmonium.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009400_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-？？？？-)魔の巣窟たる万魔殿……パンデモニウム。
ともに挑まんとする「星」とは、いかなる存在か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009410_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-???-)Oh, the sights we shall see. The sights we shall see.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_06006_009410_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-？？？？-)まだ見ぬ君に巡り会えるそのときが、楽しみだ。
